MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は黙ったまま僕の後についてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was following me in solemn silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was following me in solemn silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣には鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: 先を真人がいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was walking ahead of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was walking ahead of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 今はこの４人でリトルバスターズだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The four of us together were the current cast of the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: The four of us together were the current cast of the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、最後に僕は助ける。
MESSAGE.EN: And now I was about to help somebody else out.
MESSAGE.Translation: And now I was about to help somebody else out.

MESSAGE.JP: あの時の僕を。
MESSAGE.EN: Help the past me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Help the past me.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介を。
MESSAGE.EN: Help Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Help Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアの前で真人が立ち止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stopped in front of the door to his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stopped in front of the door to his room.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてノブを掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: He grabbed hold of the knob.
MESSAGE.Translation: He grabbed hold of the knob.

MESSAGE.JP: …いいな？　その目が僕に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...❛Are you ready?❜, his eyes asked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛Are you ready?❜, his eyes asked me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はこく、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎぃ、と開かれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The door opened with a creak.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door opened with a creak.

MESSAGE.JP: 過去への扉が。
MESSAGE.EN: The door that led to the past.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door that led to the past.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋の隅には、うなだれてうずくまる僕が。
MESSAGE.EN: In a corner of the room there sat myself, crouching on the floor with a bent head.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a corner of the room there sat myself, crouching on the floor with a bent head.

MESSAGE.JP: あの日の僕はまさしく、こんなふうだったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been how I looked back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have been how I looked back then.

MESSAGE.JP: なんて痛ましいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What a pitiful sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a pitiful sight.

MESSAGE.JP: でもその僕は…恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But this here was... Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: But this here was... Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 向かい合う。
MESSAGE.EN: I faced him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I faced him.

MESSAGE.JP: 辿りついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd gotten here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd gotten here.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく始まりの日だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd finally reached the day of the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd finally reached the day of the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: これから何が起きるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What would happen now?
MESSAGE.Translation: What would happen now?

MESSAGE.JP: 今、ようやくその不安を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: That anxiety reared its head again.
MESSAGE.Translation: That anxiety reared its head again.

MESSAGE.JP: でももう、僕はみんなのリーダーだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was now the leader.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was now the leader.

MESSAGE.JP: 何が起ころうとも、進もう。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever would happen, press onward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever would happen, press onward.

MESSAGE.JP: 暗闇の中へと足を踏み入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped into the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped into the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ついにきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're finally here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're finally here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「助けにきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're here to rescue you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're here to rescue you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らはリトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒にいこう、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come with us, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come with us, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うずくまる恭介に手を差し伸べた。
MESSAGE.EN: I held out my hand to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held out my hand to him.

MESSAGE.JP: それがゆっくり顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: He slowly raised his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: He slowly raised his head.

MESSAGE.JP: 憔悴しきった顔…。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked completely worn out.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked completely worn out.

MESSAGE.JP: その目は差し出した僕の手をじっと見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: He stared at the hand I held out to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stared at the hand I held out to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 迷っているように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked lost, unable to decide
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked lost, unable to decide

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の手を掴むべきか、どうか。
MESSAGE.EN: whether or not to take that hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: whether or not to take that hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は手を伸ばし続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept my hand stretched.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept my hand stretched.

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけ時間がかかろうとも。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how much time it would take,
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how much time it would take,

MESSAGE.JP: この手を掴んでくれるまで。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to wait until he seized my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to wait until he seized my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how many times I have repeated this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how many times I have repeated this.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はひとつのことだけをやり遂げようとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying to achieve just one thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying to achieve just one thing.

MESSAGE.JP: それ以外のことはもう何も考えていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: With nothing but this one thing on my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: With nothing but this one thing on my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: それが俺がこの世に生を受けて、最後の…
MESSAGE.EN: This is the last role that I have to...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the last role that I have to...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、ろくなことしてこなかったからな…
MESSAGE.EN: No, I doubt I've done anything worthwhile until now...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I doubt I've done anything worthwhile until now...

MESSAGE.JP: 唯一の役割かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: So this could be the only role that I get to fulfill.
MESSAGE.Translation: So this could be the only role that I get to fulfill.

MESSAGE.JP: それは…
MESSAGE.EN: And that is...
MESSAGE.Translation: And that is...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹と鈴を成長させて、この場所から見送る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...maturing Riki and Rin and sending them out of here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...maturing Riki and Rin and sending them out of here.

MESSAGE.JP: それだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's everything.

MESSAGE.JP: …ふたりを絶望させないために。
MESSAGE.EN: ...So that they won't fall into despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...So that they won't fall into despair.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、何から取りかかろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, what should I do first...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, what should I do first...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、昔みたいに、みんなで何かしない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無邪気なままの理樹がそう提案していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki makes his suggestion just as innocently as when he was a kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki makes his suggestion just as innocently as when he was a kid.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえはほんと、いつまで経っても、子供みたいな奴だな。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many years go by, you really don't change.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many years go by, you really don't change.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、それはそれで可愛くていいんだが。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, but I do find it endearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, but I do find it endearing.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、唐突に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's this all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's this all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何かって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you want to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you want to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、小学生の時。何かを悪に仕立て上げては近所をかっぽしてたでしょ、みんなで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらと一緒にするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I didn't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I didn't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は地面に転がっていた薄汚れた白球を拾い上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pick up a dirty baseball from the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pick up a dirty baseball from the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: それを指先でスピンをかけて回した。
MESSAGE.EN: And I give it a spin on my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I give it a spin on my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…野球をしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Let's play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Let's play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺らしいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: This sure sounds like me.
MESSAGE.Translation: This sure sounds like me.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだって楽しみながらやるものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever you do, you should have fun doing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever you do, you should have fun doing it.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度みんなに向き直り、繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I turn to face them and repeat my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turn to face them and repeat my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球チームを作る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're forming a baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're forming a baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「チーム名は…リトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The team name will be... Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The team name will be... Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでにメンバーは決まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The team members are already decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: The team members are already decided.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺に理樹、鈴、真人、謙吾、小毬、来ヶ谷、西園、能美、三枝の１０人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Me, Riki, Rin, Masato, Kengo, Komari, Kurugaya, Nishizono, Noumi, and Saigusa.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me, Riki, Rin, Masato, Kengo, Komari, Kurugaya, Nishizono, Noumi, and Saigusa.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえら、なんで就職活動で忙しい俺が一番一生懸命なんだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You guys, why am I trying my hardest here despite being the busiest with job hunting!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You guys, why am I trying my hardest here despite being the busiest with job hunting!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、そんな一方的にキレられても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, why are you pissed off so suddenly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, why are you pissed off so suddenly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹を見習え、俺のノックを受け続けて、見ろ、泥だらけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look at Riki! He practiced very hard with me till he was covered with mud!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look at Riki! He practiced very hard with me till he was covered with mud!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それはなんだ…？　哀れめばいいのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What are you trying to say? Should we pity him...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What are you trying to say? Should we pity him...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふたりが発案者なんだから続けるのは結構だが、部活で忙しい人間まで巻き込んでもらいたくないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You two came up with that idea, so you can keep going at it, but don't get those who're busy with club activities involved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You two came up with that idea, so you can keep going at it, but don't get those who're busy with club activities involved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよてめぇ…部活もやってねぇ筋肉馬鹿は暇だろうから、球拾いがお似合いだってかっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you getting at... You're saying that this ❛muscle idiot❜ who didn't even join any clubs must have a whole lot of free time, so fetching balls is a role befitting of him!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you getting at... You're saying that this ❛muscle idiot❜ who didn't even join any clubs must have a whole lot of free time, so fetching balls is a role befitting of him!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人の言いがかりって、ときにお金を払ってまで見たくなるほど素晴らしい言いがかりだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sometimes I really wanna pay you for your amazing comebacks, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sometimes I really wanna pay you for your amazing comebacks, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつばかだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What an idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What an idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そもそも、どうして野球なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝By the way, why baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝By the way, why baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか、それを言ってなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, I totally forgot to tell you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, I totally forgot to tell you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ちなみに何も聞いていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Actually, you haven't told us anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Actually, you haven't told us anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺はここんとこずっと就職活動に奔走してるけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As you know, I'm really busy with job hunting right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As you know, I'm really busy with job hunting right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふと、なにやってるんだろう、って思う時がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But I sometimes wonder why I'm doing such a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But I sometimes wonder why I'm doing such a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これからサラリーマンとしてあくせく働いていくんだろうな…それだけはわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm going to work as a salaryman from here on... That's all I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm going to work as a salaryman from here on... That's all I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、それはなんだか流されてるな、という気がしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝However, I've realized that this isn't by my own will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝However, I've realized that this isn't by my own will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「周りがそうし始めてるから、自分もなんとなくそうしようってだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Everybody's looking for their job, so I've also got to do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everybody's looking for their job, so I've also got to do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこには自分がいない。自分自身というものがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not my own thing. It's not something that truly belongs to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not my own thing. It's not something that truly belongs to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 皮肉な話だ。今は自分自身しかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: How very ironic. Even though there's only me here now.
MESSAGE.Translation: How very ironic. Even though there's only me here now.

MESSAGE.JP: 自らに使命を課した、自分しかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a mission no one else but me has imposed on myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a mission no one else but me has imposed on myself.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそもう迷わない。
MESSAGE.EN: So I don't hesitate anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I don't hesitate anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「体だけあっても、中身はからっぽの人形のようじゃないか。そうは思わないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Even if there's a body, if the insides are hollow it's nothing but a puppet. Don't you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Even if there's a body, if the insides are hollow it's nothing but a puppet. Don't you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは日常に生きる人間、てめぇらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That is true for all the people living their ordinary lives.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is true for all the people living their ordinary lives.

MESSAGE.JP: もし五体満足に生きていけるなら、俺だって同じだっただろうけどな。
MESSAGE.EN: If I were to keep living just like before, I probably would be one of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I were to keep living just like before, I probably would be one of them.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが同じように考えられたらいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish everybody else could think the same way as I.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish everybody else could think the same way as I.

MESSAGE.JP: 一番大事なことを考えられたらいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish they all could just think about the one thing most important to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish they all could just think about the one thing most important to them.

MESSAGE.JP: ひたすら向き合えたらいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish they all wouldn't forget about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish they all wouldn't forget about it.

MESSAGE.JP: でもこうならないと、人はきっとそれに気づけないんだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: But I guess most people can't realize it until they end up like me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I guess most people can't realize it until they end up like me.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まぁ、なんとなくはわかるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I kind of understand where you're going with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I kind of understand where you're going with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、俺は俺であり、そして俺がここにいることを証明し続けるため…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then I realized I have to do something to prove that I am me and that I am here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then I realized I have to do something to prove that I am me and that I am here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「野球をやることにした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why I've decided to play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ？　途中まで理解できていたつもりなのに、最後の部分だけ理解できなかったぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm? I was following up to a point, but I didn't get that last bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm? I was following up to a point, but I didn't get that last bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ…奇遇だな…俺もよく似た感想だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... An unexpected conclusion... My impression is similar to yours...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... An unexpected conclusion... My impression is similar to yours...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すまん、俺も強引だと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: My bad. I kind of think that I'm pushing it a bit, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: My bad. I kind of think that I'm pushing it a bit, too.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは実に自然な反応をしてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Their reaction is perfectly natural.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their reaction is perfectly natural.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「悪いが、恭介、最後の部分だけもう一度、言ってみてくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but could you repeat that last line one more time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but could you repeat that last line one more time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺は俺であり続けるため、野球をする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll play baseball to continue being myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll play baseball to continue being myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言い通せ。貫き通せ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I have to stick to it. I have to persist here.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I have to stick to it. I have to persist here.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そこでどうして野球が…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What made you choose ❛baseball❜...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What made you choose ❛baseball❜...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「考えてもみろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just imagine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just imagine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「就職活動中に野球をしようなんて誰が考えるんだ？　普通思わないだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Who would consider playing baseball while they're hunting for a job? It doesn't normally happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Who would consider playing baseball while they're hunting for a job? It doesn't normally happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まぁ、そりゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I guess, that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I guess, that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: これは理樹と鈴だけを納得させるだけの口上だ。
MESSAGE.EN: All I'm saying here is for the sake of persuading Riki and Rin only.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I'm saying here is for the sake of persuading Riki and Rin only.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「しかも、人数集めてさ…就職活動中じゃなくてもなかなかそんな気にはなれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, but that's not all there is to it. Even without job hunting, having to gather several people for the team is a hassle in itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, but that's not all there is to it. Even without job hunting, having to gather several people for the team is a hassle in itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なれるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Any objections?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Any objections?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、まあ、なれないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝N, no, can't argue there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝N, no, can't argue there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だからこそ、俺は野球をすることにしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And that's precisely why I've chosen baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And that's precisely why I've chosen baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だとしてもだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even supposing you're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even supposing you're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それじゃ、オレたちは単なる巻き添えじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aren't we just collateral damage?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aren't we just collateral damage?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、おまえたちも同じだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, there's no difference between you guys and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, there's no difference between you guys and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「試験勉強や課題に追われる日々の中で、野球をするなんて思いもしなかったはずだ。それはおまえが今さっき同意しただろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In the midst of life that has you studying for exams and doing homework, have you ever imagined yourself suddenly starting to play baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In the midst of life that has you studying for exams and doing homework, have you ever imagined yourself suddenly starting to play baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、でも野球なら普通に体育の時間にやってるんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No. But we often play it in P.E. class...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No. But we often play it in P.E. class...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「授業のような主体性のないものでやったとして、なんの意味がある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In class, there's no independence or identity. What meaning is there in it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In class, there's no independence or identity. What meaning is there in it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自らの意志で、投げて走って打ち歓喜する、そのことに意味がある。違うか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if you're doing it of your own free will, you'll feel delighted in throwing, running, and hitting. That's what's meaningful; am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if you're doing it of your own free will, you'll feel delighted in throwing, running, and hitting. That's what's meaningful; am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: よし…。どうだ？
MESSAGE.EN: All right... how's that?
MESSAGE.Translation: All right... how's that?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が席を立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo stands out of his seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo stands out of his seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「自らの意志で、剣を振るっている。ではな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I practice kendo of my own free will. See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I practice kendo of my own free will. See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふん…。相変わらずあまのじゃくな奴だな。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmph... he's twisted as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmph... he's twisted as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそ可愛げもあるってことだがな。
MESSAGE.EN: But that's also what I find cute about him.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that's also what I find cute about him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「放っておけ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let him go, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let him go, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…あいつも理解してくれる日がくるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Some day he'll understand me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Some day he'll understand me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、オレたちですらまったく理解してないんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's not like we really understand anything either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's not like we really understand anything either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ありゃ、そーなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How about you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How about you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後はおまえ次第だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The rest is all up to you.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rest is all up to you.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は…そもそも僕が言い出したことだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm in... since I was the one who said we should do something in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm in... since I was the one who said we should do something in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹は単純だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're so simple-minded, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're so simple-minded, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだよ、だからなんだってんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? What are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? What are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「利用されてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're a patsy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're a patsy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きょーすけの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kyousuke just wants to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kyousuke just wants to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きょーすけの暇つぶしに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...kill time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...kill time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介は忙しいはずだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, he must be busy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, he must be busy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんなばかだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're all idiots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're all idiots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呆れたように鈴が言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's voice is full of disbelief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's voice is full of disbelief.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あー、どうせ馬鹿さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I'm an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I'm an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よし、これで決まりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, that settles it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, that settles it.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は夕飯に箸をつけ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I dig into my dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dig into my dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: これまでのミッションは、常に楽しむだけのものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The missions we've gone through so far were all for fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: The missions we've gone through so far were all for fun.

MESSAGE.JP: けどこれからは違う。
MESSAGE.EN: But that's not the case anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that's not the case anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: すべて、理樹と鈴、ふたりを育て上げるためのものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: From this moment on, every mission we're going to have is all about raising Riki and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: From this moment on, every mission we're going to have is all about raising Riki and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいか、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Listen, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Listen, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…試合をするには足りないものがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...There's still some things we're lacking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...There's still some things we're lacking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか…わからないのか…なら教えてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You don't know? Okay, I'll tell you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You don't know? Okay, I'll tell you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そりゃあ、残りのメンバーと、練習時間と、練習道具と、おまえ以外の人間のやる気と、残りのメンバーだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We need more members, more practice, more equipment, everyone save for you needs motivation, and we need more members!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We need more members, more practice, more equipment, everyone save for you needs motivation, and we need more members!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつ残りのメンバーって二回言ったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He said ❛more members❜ twice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He said ❛more members❜ twice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人なりに意味があるんだよ、あまり深く詮索してあげないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess he did it on purpose. There must be some deep meaning to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess he did it on purpose. There must be some deep meaning to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「意味なんてねぇーーよ、ごめんなさいでしたあぁぁー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake! I'm so sorryyyy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake! I'm so sorryyyy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やっぱばかだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだとてめぇ、触りまくって馬鹿移すぞ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What did you say, Rin!? I'm gonna infect you with my stupidity!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What did you say, Rin!? I'm gonna infect you with my stupidity!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のハイキックが炸裂する。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin high-kicks Masato instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin high-kicks Masato instead.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえ、真人にだけは強いな。
MESSAGE.EN: You sure are strong against him only.
MESSAGE.Translation: You sure are strong against him only.

MESSAGE.JP: もっと他の奴に対しても、突っ込んでいって友達とか作れないものかな。
MESSAGE.EN: If only you could be this open toward others and make friends with them.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only you could be this open toward others and make friends with them.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そこんとこどうなんだ、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do about it, Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do about it, Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「練習道具はあるだろう。野球部のを使えばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's plenty of equipment. Left by the old baseball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's plenty of equipment. Left by the old baseball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「残りのメンバーは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What about members?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What about members?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これから探すさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Finding them comes next.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Finding them comes next.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「残り５人、見つかるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You need five more members. Can you make it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You need five more members. Can you make it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなものはすでに決まっている。謙吾、おまえもわかっているだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: You should also know who those five will be, don't you, Kengo?
MESSAGE.Translation: You should also know who those five will be, don't you, Kengo?

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なあ、鈴。ちょっとこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Rin. Come here for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Rin. Come here for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は鈴を呼び寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I gesture her to come to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gesture her to come to me.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ひとつ頼まれてくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can you do me a favor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can you do me a favor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろん、メンバー集めだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Collecting members, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Collecting members, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなのできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't do something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't do something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、聞け。おまえこれを耳につけろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, just listen. Put this on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, just listen. Put this on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はお手製の秘密道具を取り出し、それを鈴の耳に装着させた。
MESSAGE.EN: I take out one of my hand-made secret tools and have her put it on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I take out one of my hand-made secret tools and have her put it on.

MESSAGE.JP: 続いて俺は携帯を取り出し、受話器を耳に当て、もしもし、と話しかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I pull out my mobile and say ❛hello❜ into its microphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I pull out my mobile and say ❛hello❜ into its microphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が飛び退くぐらい驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: She gets so startled that she physically jumps back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gets so startled that she physically jumps back.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「感度良好。早速任務を命ずる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Great reception. I'll assign you a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Great reception. I'll assign you a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頑張ってこい、鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: You can do it, Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: You can do it, Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: だが、とにかく何をやるにも『楽しく』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, whatever we do, we must do it with ❛fun.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, whatever we do, we must do it with ❛fun.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 辛いだけの人生なんて、生きる意味ねぇもんな。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no point whatsoever in living a life full of hardship and misery.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no point whatsoever in living a life full of hardship and misery.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴、それはおまえが一番わかってるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, you out of everyone should know that well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, you out of everyone should know that well.

MESSAGE.JP: 生きる怖さを覚えてしまった遠い日。
MESSAGE.EN: That distant day, when you learned how scary living can be.
MESSAGE.Translation: That distant day, when you learned how scary living can be.

MESSAGE.JP: そこからふたりで歩いてこれたんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Ever since then, the two of us have been walking together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ever since then, the two of us have been walking together.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふたり向かい合って、手を組め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You two, face each other and put your hands together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You two, face each other and put your hands together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでこいつなんかとっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why do I have to do this with HIM?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why do I have to do this with HIM?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえたちのせいなんだから、ほら協力しろ、時間がないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Because you two are at fault. Hurry up, we're running out of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Because you two are at fault. Hurry up, we're running out of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴はふたりの力を借りて、３階まで一気にジャンプする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin will borrow your combined power and jump all the way up to the classroom on the third floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin will borrow your combined power and jump all the way up to the classroom on the third floor.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ、おまえの身体能力なら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It'll be fine. I have full faith in your physical abilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It'll be fine. I have full faith in your physical abilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、窓をくぐると、すぐそこは教室ってわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, when you pass through the window, you'll be in the classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, when you pass through the window, you'll be in the classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「つまりショートカットってわけか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝To put it simply, we're taking a shortcut?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝To put it simply, we're taking a shortcut?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「せーのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝One - two!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝One - two!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いっくぜえぇぇーー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here we go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here we go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「うおらああぁぁーーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oryaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oryaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ぎゃあああぁぁぁぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Gyaaaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Gyaaaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「探す場所がかぶったら効率悪いだろ。あ、次は～どこどこ～、どこどこ～って、報告してこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It won't be effective if you aren't all looking in different places. ❛Next stop is... something-something,❜ do it just like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It won't be effective if you aren't all looking in different places. ❛Next stop is... something-something,❜ do it just like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんな車掌風に言う必要なんてねぇだろが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝There's no need to act like train conductors...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There's no need to act like train conductors...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「否、ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのほうが楽しいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Because it'll be more fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because it'll be more fun.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ないはずなのに、こいつ言い切りやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It can't possibly be, but he's saying it with such an air of confidence...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It can't possibly be, but he's saying it with such an air of confidence...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はレノンの尻尾にメモを巻きつけてやる。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrap a piece of paper around Lennon's tail.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrap a piece of paper around Lennon's tail.

MESSAGE.JP: この世界では、レノンは俺の分身だ。
MESSAGE.EN: In this world he is part of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world he is part of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 意のままに操ることができる。
MESSAGE.EN: I can control him any way I want.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can control him any way I want.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほら、いけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴に対するミッションも、平行してスタートだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus I start the missions for Rin as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus I start the missions for Rin as well.

MESSAGE.JP: この世界の秘密を解き明かしてみろ。
MESSAGE.EN: I dare you to find out the secret of the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dare you to find out the secret of the world.

MESSAGE.JP: そこまで来てみせろ。
MESSAGE.EN: And make it there.
MESSAGE.Translation: And make it there.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これからの練習方針についてなんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It concerns the practice we're about to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It concerns the practice we're about to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹をバッターとして徹底的に鍛え上げる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to train really hard, and make Riki into an awesome batter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to train really hard, and make Riki into an awesome batter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんて間抜けな顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish you could see the look on your face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish you could see the look on your face.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「また、どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この中で一番ひ弱そうだからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's the weakest one among us. That's why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's the weakest one among us. That's why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな奴がシュアなバッティングでヒットを連ねてみろ、意外性があって、展開的に燃えるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Could you imagine somebody like him being a big hitter? That unexpected development would make everyone go crazy with excitement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Could you imagine somebody like him being a big hitter? That unexpected development would make everyone go crazy with excitement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、また漫画の影響か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's this? A story from some manga again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's this? A story from some manga again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、鈴がピッチャーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Furthermore, Rin will be the pitcher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Furthermore, Rin will be the pitcher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「一応理由を聞いておくが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I wouldn't mind hearing the reason for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I wouldn't mind hearing the reason for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「無論、そのほうが展開的に燃えるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Obviously, this way she'll be able to show her true colors when the time comes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Obviously, this way she'll be able to show her true colors when the time comes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「展開ってなんの展開？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True colors... just what kind of true colors?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True colors... just what kind of true colors?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺の頭にある、計画の展開だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The development of the plan I've got in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: The development of the plan I've got in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「漫画の影響だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just like in a manga...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just like in a manga...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、練習を始めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let the training commence!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let the training commence!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹がバッター、鈴はピッチャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you bat. Rin, you pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you bat. Rin, you pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は、ふたりを徹底的に鍛え上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to train the two of them hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to train the two of them hard.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なあ、オレがしたいのはこんな回りくどいスポーツなんかじゃなく、拳を直接交える熱いバトルなんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You know, this kind of passive sport isn't something I want to do. I want something where I can use my fists... like a hot battle, or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You know, this kind of passive sport isn't something I want to do. I want something where I can use my fists... like a hot battle, or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえじゃ、謙吾相手じゃないと張り合えないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Listen now, unless your opponent is someone like Kengo, it can't even be called a match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Listen now, unless your opponent is someone like Kengo, it can't even be called a match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あ、そーだ、そいつもルールに則った遊びにしちまおう。そのほうが楽しいだろ、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, that's it. I'll create rules and have him follow them as well. It'll be more fun this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, that's it. I'll create rules and have him follow them as well. It'll be more fun this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また新しい遊び？　好きだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A new game? You sure love them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A new game? You sure love them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ランキング制にしよう。理由は無論、燃えるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's make a ranking system. The reason, obviously, is to heat up the competition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's make a ranking system. The reason, obviously, is to heat up the competition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 充実した時間が過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a fulfilling school life.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a fulfilling school life.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹と鈴は、強くなっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki and Rin, they are steadily growing stronger
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki and Rin, they are steadily growing stronger

MESSAGE.JP: 止まった時間の中で。
MESSAGE.EN: in the world whose time has stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: in the world whose time has stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯が鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone rings.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone rings.

MESSAGE.JP: 画面を見ると、『直枝理樹』の文字。
MESSAGE.EN: The display reads ❛Riki Naoe.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The display reads ❛Riki Naoe.❜

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなく予想がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I can more or less tell what he wants.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can more or less tell what he wants.

MESSAGE.JP: あの話の後だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because we just talked about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because we just talked about that.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだといいな、そう思いつつ通話ボタンを押して出る。
MESSAGE.EN: Hoping that it's what I wish to hear, I press the button.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hoping that it's what I wish to hear, I press the button.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Hello?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Hello?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『きょ、恭介？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Kyo, Kyousuke?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Kyo, Kyousuke?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹の声が裏返る。
MESSAGE.EN: His voice is unnaturally shrill.
MESSAGE.Translation: His voice is unnaturally shrill.

MESSAGE.JP: はは…まったくわかりやすい奴だな。
MESSAGE.EN: Haha... you're really easy to understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haha... you're really easy to understand.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『あの、話したいことがあるんだ、今いい？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[There's something I want to talk to you about, are you free?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[There's something I want to talk to you about, are you free?]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『えっと…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Um...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Um...]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『直接会って話がしたいんだけど…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[I wish to tell you in person...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[I wish to tell you in person...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうしたんだ？　改まって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong? You sound so formal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong? You sound so formal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『いや、それなりの理由が…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Well, there's a reason why...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Well, there's a reason why...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「彼女でもできたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Did you get yourself a girlfriend or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Did you get yourself a girlfriend or something?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Ugh...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Ugh...]

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉に詰まっている。図星なんだろう。本当にわかりやすい奴だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He stops talking; I seem to have hit the bull's-eye. He really is simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stops talking; I seem to have hit the bull's-eye. He really is simple.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか、よかったじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see, isn't that great?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see, isn't that great?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『それが、相手が…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[But, I'm talking about...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[But, I'm talking about...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴だろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Eh...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Eh...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴じゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっちのほうが驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: If not, that'd be a real surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: If not, that'd be a real surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『いや、そうです…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[No, it's her...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[No, it's her...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Thought so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Thought so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そいつは俺も嬉しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really glad to hear that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really glad to hear that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Eh...?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Eh...?]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺はさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうなったらいいなって、ずっと思ってたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I always thought it'd be great if this happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I always thought it'd be great if this happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『そうだったの…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Did you...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Did you...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、これからもふたり仲良くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why, I hope you keep getting along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why, I hope you keep getting along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『うん…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Yeah...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Yeah...]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@『ありがとう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Thank you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Thank you.]

MESSAGE.JP: すべてが上手くいっているように思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: This event makes me think that everything's going to go well.
MESSAGE.Translation: This event makes me think that everything's going to go well.

MESSAGE.JP: このふたりなら乗り越えていける。
MESSAGE.EN: Together, Riki and Rin can overcome anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Together, Riki and Rin can overcome anything.

MESSAGE.JP: そう確信を得た。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm certain of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm certain of that.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、俺は鈴に次のミッションを課した。
MESSAGE.EN: So, I make up my mind and give her another mission.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, I make up my mind and give her another mission.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「初めまして。２年Ｅ組の直枝です。よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hello. I'm Naoe from class 2-E. Pleased to meet you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hello. I'm Naoe from class 2-E. Pleased to meet you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし。鈴もいけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay. Rin, your turn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay. Rin, your turn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、あたしも今のはよかったと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep. I think it was okay, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep. I think it was okay, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いけ、というのは、おまえもやれ、という意味だ。誰がおまえに感想を求めた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝When I say ❛your turn,❜ I mean ❛you do it now.❜ No one asked for your opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝When I say ❛your turn,❜ I mean ❛you do it now.❜ No one asked for your opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Say what...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Say what...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかおまえ、さっきから教える側に立っているようなスタンスでいるよな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You've been standing there looking like you think yourself some kinda teacher for a while now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You've been standing there looking like you think yourself some kinda teacher for a while now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ちゃんと教えられる側という自覚はあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Do you realize that you're the one being taught here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Do you realize that you're the one being taught here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うっさい、ぼけただけじゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut it, didn't I simp...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut it, didn't I simp...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ぶーぶーうっさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Beep, beep, you're getting on my nerves!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Beep, beep, you're getting on my nerves!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: ブーーーー！
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*!

MESSAGE.JP: 色々あって大変だったが…
MESSAGE.EN: It took a lot of effort on our part...
MESSAGE.Translation: It took a lot of effort on our part...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はなんとかその大役を務めてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...but Rin did a great job as a guide.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...but Rin did a great job as a guide.

MESSAGE.JP: そうすれば、計画通り、最後のミッションに繋がることになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And that means that it's time for me to give her the final mission.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that means that it's time for me to give her the final mission.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が俺たちから離れ、初めてひとりで立ち向かうミッションだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the first mission that she has to work on alone, without us.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the first mission that she has to work on alone, without us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴ひとりの強さが試される。
MESSAGE.EN: This is a test to see how much stronger she has become.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is a test to see how much stronger she has become.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹にとっても辛いに違いない。恋人同士になったばかりなのに、引き離されるのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki will have a hard time of it too, since they just started seeing each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki will have a hard time of it too, since they just started seeing each other.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、今のふたりなら大丈夫だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I'm confident that they are now strong enough to get through this...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I'm confident that they are now strong enough to get through this...

MESSAGE.JP: 力を合わせて、ここまで乗り切ってきたんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: They have overcome a lot of difficulties together to get this far.
MESSAGE.Translation: They have overcome a lot of difficulties together to get this far.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、ふたりは簡単に決断はできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, it takes time for them to decide.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, it takes time for them to decide.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は、鈴以上に悩んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki especially needs much more time than Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki especially needs much more time than Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜなら、理樹は鈴を止めることのできる唯一の人間だったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because he is the only one who can tell her not to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because he is the only one who can tell her not to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は最後の指令を紙に書く。
MESSAGE.EN: I write the last order on a piece of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I write the last order on a piece of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 内容はもちろん、こうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Needless to say, it goes like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Needless to say, it goes like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 『併設校を救え』
MESSAGE.EN: [Save the sister school.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Save the sister school.]

MESSAGE.JP: これをレノンに託し、鈴の背を押す。
MESSAGE.EN: I send Lennon with the note to give Rin one last push on the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I send Lennon with the note to give Rin one last push on the back.

MESSAGE.JP: だがそれを悟ったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: However, that seems to have made Riki realize.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, that seems to have made Riki realize.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は、レノンを追ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: He follows Lennon to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He follows Lennon to me.

MESSAGE.JP: この事態をけしかけた黒幕を暴きにかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: He's trying to unveil the mastermind behind these missions.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's trying to unveil the mastermind behind these missions.

MESSAGE.JP: 真夜中の校舎裏。
MESSAGE.EN: In the dark of the night, behind the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the dark of the night, behind the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 教師をけしかけても理樹は一度いなくなった振りをして、また戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A teacher tells him to go back to the dorm, yet he comes back again.
MESSAGE.Translation: A teacher tells him to go back to the dorm, yet he comes back again.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、仕方なく現れてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: So I give up and show myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I give up and show myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは困った奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You sure are a handful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You sure are a handful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「意固地なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm stubborn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm stubborn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、答えを知るにはまだ早いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's too early for you to learn the answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's too early for you to learn the answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「早くなんてないよ、遅すぎたぐらいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっと早く気づくべきだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should've realized from the beginning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should've realized from the beginning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱりすごいね、恭介は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really are amazing, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really are amazing, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでもうまくやってのける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's nothing you can't do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's nothing you can't do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなことはないさ…俺だって失敗はする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's not true... Even I mess up sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's not true... Even I mess up sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それだって、筋書きには大して影響しない微々たるものでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But even when you do, things still go according to your scenario.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But even when you do, things still go according to your scenario.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「学食の問題なんて、どうやって予想したの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did you know the whole thing with the cafeteria would happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did you know the whole thing with the cafeteria would happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 予想なんてしちゃあいない。そう仕立て上げただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have to know anything; I just set that up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have to know anything; I just set that up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介はほんとに予知能力でも持ってる超能力者じゃないのかって思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sometimes I wonder if you can actually see the future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sometimes I wonder if you can actually see the future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「思い返せば、いつだってそんなふうだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's always been like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's always been like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介の言葉に、現実のほうが吸い寄せられていくんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like you can somehow bend reality to your will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like you can somehow bend reality to your will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「現実はそんな簡単にはいかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Reality isn't that simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Reality isn't that simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕にはそう見えるんだよ…恭介がどう感じてようが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's how it appears to me... I don't care what you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's how it appears to me... I don't care what you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ理樹、おまえが解き明かした答えを聞かせてもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, did you figure out the answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, did you figure out the answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は頷き、話し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He nods and launches into speech.
MESSAGE.Translation: He nods and launches into speech.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介は、鈴を自分の庇護から離し、ずっと独り立ちさせたいと考えていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were trying to remove Rin from your constant care, to make her independent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were trying to remove Rin from your constant care, to make her independent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介は就職してしまうし、それから先はこれまで通り守ってやれなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're going to get employed eventually, and won't be able to look after her forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're going to get employed eventually, and won't be able to look after her forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから鈴を自立させたかった。それは鈴のためにもいつかはするべきことだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you tried to make her self-sufficient. It was something you had to do one day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you tried to make her self-sufficient. It was something you had to do one day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そして、その機会は訪れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And then, a chance presented itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And then, a chance presented itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校内で併設校との交換留学生の話が持ち上がる。恭介はそれに目ざとく便乗した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You heard about the student exchange program with the sister school, so you seized that opportunity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You heard about the student exchange program with the sister school, so you seized that opportunity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たちから鈴ひとりを引き離し、自立させるには格好の舞台だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was the perfect chance to separate Rin from us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was the perfect chance to separate Rin from us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、それに選任されるように、レノンを使って、用意周到に状況を操ってきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For that, you used Lennon to get her assigned to the role, carefully manipulating every detail of the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For that, you used Lennon to get her assigned to the role, carefully manipulating every detail of the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …話は終わったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like he's finished.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like he's finished.

MESSAGE.JP: やはり、それだけか。
MESSAGE.EN: As I predicted, that's the extent of what he knows.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I predicted, that's the extent of what he knows.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…そんなことが可能だと思うか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you really think something like that is possible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you really think something like that is possible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕の知ってる恭介なら、やってみせるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If anyone could do it, it's you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If anyone could do it, it's you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうなの、今の答えは？　正解なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is my guess correct?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is my guess correct?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ご明察」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…といきたいところだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Or so I'd like to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Or so I'd like to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そもそも、おまえは問題をはき違えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that's not what I was asking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that's not what I was asking about.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺が解き明かしたかを訊いたのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What I asked you was whether you had figured out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What I asked you was whether you had figured out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この世界の秘密だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...the secret of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...the secret of this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「冗談じゃない、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm being serious here, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm being serious here, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな問いに対する答えは、存在しない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no answer to that question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no answer to that question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしあるとしたら、それは鈴の興味を引きつけるための餌でしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if there were, wasn't that just bait to catch Rin's interest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if there were, wasn't that just bait to catch Rin's interest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それとも何？　世界の謎ってのは、哲学的な模索？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or what? Did you mean it in some philosophical way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or what? Did you mean it in some philosophical way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あるいは歴史の話？　さらに遡って宇宙がどうしてできたとか科学の話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or perhaps historical? Or something scientific, like, how did the universe begin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or perhaps historical? Or something scientific, like, how did the universe begin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は黙ったままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I keep myself silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: I keep myself silent.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話だったら、どんなによかったか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish that things would be that easy and simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish that things would be that easy and simple.

MESSAGE.JP: 滑稽なほどに、話はもっと現実的だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But the answer is ridiculously more realistic.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the answer is ridiculously more realistic.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてその現実はあまりに残酷だ。
MESSAGE.EN: And that reality is far too cruel.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that reality is far too cruel.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「はっはっはっは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hahahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hahahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大笑いしてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I laugh out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I laugh out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: それは作戦でもあったし、実際俯瞰して見ると笑えて仕方がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to do it no matter what he said, but his theories actually are hilarious.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to do it no matter what he said, but his theories actually are hilarious.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙が出そうなほどに笑えた。
MESSAGE.EN: They are hilarious enough to make me laugh myself into tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: They are hilarious enough to make me laugh myself into tears.

MESSAGE.JP: 案の定、理樹は呆然と立ちつくす。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, he just stands there, suddenly at a loss.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, he just stands there, suddenly at a loss.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「誰だ、そこにいるのは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Who's there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Who's there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おっと、まずいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oops, this is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oops, this is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は理樹の手を取り、走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I take his hand and take off running.
MESSAGE.Translation: I take his hand and take off running.

MESSAGE.JP: 昔のように。
MESSAGE.EN: Like the way we always used to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like the way we always used to.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、今夜は途中で手を放す。
MESSAGE.EN: But tonight I let go of him midway through.
MESSAGE.Translation: But tonight I let go of him midway through.

MESSAGE.JP: もうおまえを引いてはいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't take your hand anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't take your hand anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹、おまえはもう、自分で走るんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki, you must press onward by yourself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki, you must press onward by yourself.

MESSAGE.JP: そして…別れの朝がきた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then... the time of parting arrives.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then... the time of parting arrives.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんて顔してんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you hiding your face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you hiding your face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「死地に赴く兵士じゃあるまいし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like we're sending a soldier to war...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like we're sending a soldier to war...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちゃんと夏休みには、また会えるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You'll see her when summer vacation starts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You'll see her when summer vacation starts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「二週間に一回は戻ってきていいって話になってるだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And she can come back every two weeks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And she can come back every two weeks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: これまでずっと毎日…一緒にいたけどな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though until today... we've been together all the time...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though until today... we've been together all the time...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりでも、頑張るんだぞ、鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when you're alone, Rin, bear with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when you're alone, Rin, bear with it.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は…ずっとおまえを守ってはいけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't... be with you and protect you forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't... be with you and protect you forever.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「不安なのはわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I know how you feel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I know how you feel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「わかるが…そんな顔するな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But... don't make a face like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But... don't make a face like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺だって…胸が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: Like you... I am hurt too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like you... I am hurt too.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな…見たこともないような不安な顔をしている鈴を…ただ見送らなくちゃいけないなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't take seeing her with such an uneasy look... and just sending her out...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't take seeing her with such an uneasy look... and just sending her out...

MESSAGE.JP: すぐにでも助けてやりたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I could help her right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I could help her right now...

MESSAGE.JP: 全部なかったことにしてやりたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish everything would be just a dream...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish everything would be just a dream...

MESSAGE.JP: 陥れた俺自身をぶん殴ってやりたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I could punch myself in the face right here...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I could punch myself in the face right here...

MESSAGE.JP: でも俺は…
MESSAGE.EN: Still...
MESSAGE.Translation: Still...

MESSAGE.JP: 少しも表情を変えずに言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to send her away without showing my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to send her away without showing my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなが笑って見送れないだろ…あんまり心配させてやるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We need to smile... Don't make her worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We need to smile... Don't make her worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは、傷ついた人たちを助けにいくんだぞ？　その自覚はあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're going over there to help students overcome their trauma. Do you realize that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're going over there to help students overcome their trauma. Do you realize that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなんじゃ、おまえのほうが助けてほしいみたいじゃないかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stop acting like you're the one who needs help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stop acting like you're the one who needs help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほら、胸を張れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Here, keep your chin up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Here, keep your chin up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう叱咤した。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently rebuke her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently rebuke her.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「猫たちにお別れはいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Did you say goodbye to your cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Did you say goodbye to your cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう、なんの反応もない…。
MESSAGE.EN: She no longer responds at all...
MESSAGE.Translation: She no longer responds at all...

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、怯えて…不安だけに支配されている…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's only scared... She's filled with fear...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's only scared... She's filled with fear...

MESSAGE.JP: とっとと、連れていってくれ！
MESSAGE.EN: Just take her already!
MESSAGE.Translation: Just take her already!

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は心の中で叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I shout in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shout in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 車のエンジン音が近づいてきて、それがすぐそこで止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: A car pulls up right in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: A car pulls up right in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: いってらっしゃい、という声が続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody gives parting words to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody gives parting words to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は…連れられていった。
MESSAGE.EN: They... have taken her away.
MESSAGE.Translation: They... have taken her away.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どこにいく気だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Where're you going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Where're you going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は答えず、俺の横を抜けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: He passes me by without reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: He passes me by without reply.

MESSAGE.JP: その腕をつかんで止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I grasp his arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grasp his arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで止めるんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you stopping me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you stopping me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「無理だ。おまえは鈴の居る場所にはたどり着けない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You won't be able to go where she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You won't be able to go where she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「調べればなんとかなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can figure out the place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can figure out the place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は俺の手から逃れようとしたが、無駄だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He tries to free his hand, but I don't let him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tries to free his hand, but I don't let him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕を握り返される。力一杯に。
MESSAGE.EN: He seizes hold of my arm with all his might in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seizes hold of my arm with all his might in return.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴が今…どうなってるのか…知ってるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you know... how Rin feels...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you know... how Rin feels...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は…泣いてるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's... crying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's... crying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとりきりで…泣いてるんだぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's crying... all alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's crying... all alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今も、ひとり遠い場所で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's far away, all by herself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's far away, all by herself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴が泣いてるところなんて…恭介でさえ…知らないんじゃないのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you... have never seen her crying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you... have never seen her crying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I haven't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I haven't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…あいつは泣かなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...She never cried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...She never cried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だが、それは俺がいつも守っていたからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that's because she's always been under my care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that's because she's always been under my care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、今回も助けてやろうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then help her one more time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then help her one more time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それじゃあ意味がない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then there would be no meaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then there would be no meaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「意味がないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No meaning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No meaning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そもそもこんな乱暴なやり方じゃ、どんな意味もなさないよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the point in doing it in such a forceful way!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the point in doing it in such a forceful way!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっと大事なものまでなくしてしまうかもしれないじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're on the verge of losing something way more important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're on the verge of losing something way more important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たちが今日まで育んできたもの…大事なものたくさん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All these things we've done together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All these things we've done together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介は、ぜんぶ壊してしまいたいの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do they mean nothing to you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do they mean nothing to you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は守る…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will help her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will help her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとりになっても、守り続ける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if no else does, I will always help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if no else does, I will always help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、鈴を迎えにいく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why I'll go to her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why I'll go to her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 限界だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like he's at his limit...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like he's at his limit...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は手の力を緩める。
MESSAGE.EN: I loosen my grip.
MESSAGE.Translation: I loosen my grip.

MESSAGE.JP: 譲歩するしかないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I have to compromise here...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I have to compromise here...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「後三日頑張れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just bear with it for three days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just bear with it for three days.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「次の土曜には戻ってこれるようにする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll make it so she can come back next Saturday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll make it so she can come back next Saturday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、今週はなんとか…死にものぐるいでいい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just till the weekend... Stick it out until then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just till the weekend... Stick it out until then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「乗り越えてみせてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Show me that you can overcome this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Show me that you can overcome this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は一週間だけはなんとか乗り切ってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin managed to make it through the first week.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin managed to make it through the first week.

MESSAGE.JP: それ以上は無理だと誰の目に見ても明らかだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's obvious that she can't keep it up any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's obvious that she can't keep it up any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、こんなことすら乗り切れない鈴が…一体どうやってこれからの過酷に立ち向かっていける？
MESSAGE.EN: But how can she stand up to what hardships the future holds... if she can't overcome something like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: But how can she stand up to what hardships the future holds... if she can't overcome something like this?

MESSAGE.JP: こうするしかないだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the only way...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the only way...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は間違ってやいない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not mistaken...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not mistaken...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が理樹を連れて現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo appears together with Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo appears together with Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「こいつは…穏やかじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その顔を見てすぐ悟る。
MESSAGE.EN: I can easily figure out what they are here for.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can easily figure out what they are here for.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾も限界に達したのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Now Kengo has reached his limit also.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now Kengo has reached his limit also.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺を倒して、止めるつもりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's intending to force me to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's intending to force me to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: だがそれもねじ伏せてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I bring him down.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I bring him down.

MESSAGE.JP: あざとく、狡猾に、謙吾をはめてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: Cleverly and artfully, I throw him into a trap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cleverly and artfully, I throw him into a trap.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふざけるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What the hell...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What the hell...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 水しぶきを振り払うように高らかに叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He lashes out, scattering droplets of water in every direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lashes out, scattering droplets of water in every direction.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「茶番だあぁぁぁーーーーーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝CHEAP TRICKS!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝CHEAP TRICKS!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「恭介ぇぇーーー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝KYOUSUKE!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝KYOUSUKE!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: はは…俺はなんだってするさ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haha... I will do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haha... I will do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけ殴られたって構わねぇよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't care how many punches I take...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't care how many punches I take...

MESSAGE.JP: その晩、理樹は鈴を連れて逃げ出した。
MESSAGE.EN: That same night, Riki and Rin escape.
MESSAGE.Translation: That same night, Riki and Rin escape.

MESSAGE.JP: いつから歯車が狂い始めていたんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Since when have the gears been getting out of order?
MESSAGE.Translation: Since when have the gears been getting out of order?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺のやり方は間違っていたのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I wrong about my plan?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I wrong about my plan?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そもそもすべては不可能だったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I suppose from the beginning there was nothing I could change.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I suppose from the beginning there was nothing I could change.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりはずっと弱いままで…
MESSAGE.EN: The two of them will stay weak forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of them will stay weak forever...

MESSAGE.JP: そして、この世界で永遠に子供として遊んでいる、それしかできなかったのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: All they might be able to do is keep playing like children in this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: All they might be able to do is keep playing like children in this world...

MESSAGE.JP: それは謙吾が望んでいたことでもある。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what Kengo wished for.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what Kengo wished for.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺ひとり、自分のやり方を信じてきて…
MESSAGE.EN: Only I believed in my own plan...
MESSAGE.Translation: Only I believed in my own plan...

MESSAGE.JP: 強行に進めて…
MESSAGE.EN: Enforced it without asking anybody else's opinion...
MESSAGE.Translation: Enforced it without asking anybody else's opinion...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴を追いつめて…
MESSAGE.EN: Drove Rin into a corner...
MESSAGE.Translation: Drove Rin into a corner...

MESSAGE.JP: そして鈴の持つトラウマを突きつけて…
MESSAGE.EN: Made her dig up her personal trauma...
MESSAGE.Translation: Made her dig up her personal trauma...

MESSAGE.JP: ――絶望させた。
MESSAGE.EN: ――and drove her to despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――and drove her to despair.

MESSAGE.JP: また繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything will be repeated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything will be repeated.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度でも繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: また同じ朝が始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The same morning begins yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The same morning begins yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、鈴の精神は壊れたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But Rin's mind remains broken.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Rin's mind remains broken.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな俺を軽蔑するか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will everybody despise me?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will everybody despise me?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺のやったことは間違いだったって。
MESSAGE.EN: Will they accuse me of being in the wrong?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will they accuse me of being in the wrong?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴をあんなにしてしまったって。
MESSAGE.EN: I did something horrible to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did something horrible to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなで元気に遊んでいればよかったんだって。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛We should have just kept playing around and having fun.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛We should have just kept playing around and having fun.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そう俺を責め立てるか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will they accuse me with those words?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will they accuse me with those words?

MESSAGE.JP: いいだろう…すべて受け入れよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Very well... I'll take it all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Very well... I'll take it all.

MESSAGE.JP: だけどな…
MESSAGE.EN: Yet...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は戦い続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to keep on fighting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to keep on fighting.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりでも戦い続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it's me alone, I'm going to keep on fighting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it's me alone, I'm going to keep on fighting.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは助かるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of them will definitely survive.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of them will definitely survive.

MESSAGE.JP: 強くさえあれば。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as they are strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as they are strong.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は助ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to save them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to save them.

MESSAGE.JP: そのためには、なんだってする。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to do anything I can for that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to do anything I can for that.

MESSAGE.JP: ルールだって犯す。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it means breaking the rules.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it means breaking the rules.

MESSAGE.JP: 倫理だって踏みにじる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it means abandoning morality.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it means abandoning morality.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、あのふたりだけは助ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever it takes, I'm going to save those two.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever it takes, I'm going to save those two.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対に助ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm definitely going to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm definitely going to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: 目覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I wake up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wake up.

MESSAGE.JP: 暗い目覚めだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wake up in darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wake up in darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度目になるだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How many times have I woken up like this...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many times have I woken up like this...?

MESSAGE.JP: なんていう世界だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't believe the world that I'm in now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't believe the world that I'm in now...

MESSAGE.JP: 今、どこにいるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where am I now...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where am I now...?

MESSAGE.JP: ろくに体を動かして確認することもできない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't even tell that because I can't move myself the way I want...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't even tell that because I can't move myself the way I want...

MESSAGE.JP: ただ油の匂いが充満している…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's just the smell of gasoline...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's just the smell of gasoline...

MESSAGE.JP: 前よりもずっと濃い。
MESSAGE.EN: It's become stronger than before.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's become stronger than before.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は前進を始める…
MESSAGE.EN: I start moving forward...
MESSAGE.Translation: I start moving forward...

MESSAGE.JP: 痛みを堪えつつ、這うようにして…
MESSAGE.EN: Bearing the pain, I crawl...
MESSAGE.Translation: Bearing the pain, I crawl...

MESSAGE.JP: ずるずると…。
MESSAGE.EN: Like a worm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Like a worm...

MESSAGE.JP: 探し当てないとな…
MESSAGE.EN: I must find out
MESSAGE.Translation: I must find out

MESSAGE.JP: その場所を…。
MESSAGE.EN: where it is...
MESSAGE.Translation: where it is...

MESSAGE.JP: 呼ぶ声がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I hear somebody's voice...
MESSAGE.Translation: I hear somebody's voice...

MESSAGE.JP: …おれも…限界だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess... I'm about to reach my limit too...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess... I'm about to reach my limit too...

MESSAGE.JP: 戻らないとな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to get back...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to get back...

MESSAGE.JP: …ふぎゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: ...Guhhh!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Guhhh!

MESSAGE.JP: …鳴かない、鳴かない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No crying, no crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No crying, no crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 騒がしい声がする。
