MESSAGE.EN: I hear people talking noisily.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hear people talking noisily.

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げる。理樹に鈴、そして真人の姿まであった。
MESSAGE.EN: I raise my face and find Riki, Rin and even Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raise my face and find Riki, Rin and even Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: そっか…勝ったのか、理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: So... you won, Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: So... you won, Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: よくやったな。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm proud of you.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm proud of you.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おそろいでどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What are you guys doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What are you guys doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言うと、理樹がびくっと飛び上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: My sudden appearance makes Riki jump in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: My sudden appearance makes Riki jump in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、いたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, so you are here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, so you are here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のほうは冷静だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin remains calm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin remains calm.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「明かりつけるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll switch on the light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll switch on the light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やめてくれ、これから眠るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't. I'm going to sleep now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't. I'm going to sleep now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はひとり誰も知らない、抜け穴を見つけたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I've found a loophole that nobody else knows about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've found a loophole that nobody else knows about.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、世界は今も止まったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, the other world is still on hold.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, the other world is still on hold.

MESSAGE.JP: なら…
MESSAGE.EN: Then...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then...

MESSAGE.JP: それは矛盾しないか？
MESSAGE.EN: isn't that conflicting?
MESSAGE.Translation: isn't that conflicting?

MESSAGE.JP: この世界はどうなっているんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's happening with this world...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's happening with this world...?

MESSAGE.JP: どうして俺はいつも戻ってこれるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why can I always return back here...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why can I always return back here...?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「心配して来てやったのに、顔も見せねぇってかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We came to see you because we're worried about you, but you aren't even gonna let us see your face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We came to see you because we're worried about you, but you aren't even gonna let us see your face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の言葉が思考を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's remark cuts off my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's remark cuts off my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺なら元気だ…問題ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine... No problems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine... No problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どんなツラ下げて言ってんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So why not just let us see your face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So why not just let us see your face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ…寝させてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm just fine... Let me sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm just fine... Let me sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 疲れた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm exhausted...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm exhausted...

MESSAGE.JP: それはもちろん、あの闇の底を這いずって、歩み続けたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, that's because I've been crawling at the bottom of that darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, that's because I've been crawling at the bottom of that darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそれでも…どれだけ進んだだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: But... I don't know how far I've made it...
MESSAGE.Translation: But... I don't know how far I've made it...

MESSAGE.JP: 這って、這って…。
MESSAGE.EN: Crawling and crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: Crawling and crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: ほんの数歩ぶんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I imagine it was no more than a couple steps...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I imagine it was no more than a couple steps...

MESSAGE.JP: ここではこんなに簡単に歩みを進められるのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though here I can walk without any effort...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though here I can walk without any effort...

MESSAGE.JP: 歩きながらそんなことを考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm thinking that while walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm thinking that while walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「幽霊みたいだぞ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You look like a ghost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You look like a ghost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介、休んだほうがいいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, you better get some rest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, you better get some rest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だからそうさせてもらうって言ってるだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I told you, I'm going to sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I told you, I'm going to sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 布団に潜り込むと、壁を向いて体を丸めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I get in bed, face the wall and curl myself up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I get in bed, face the wall and curl myself up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしかして…昨日までの真人と同じ状態なんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe... he's going through whatever it was that Masato experienced until yesterday...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe... he's going through whatever it was that Masato experienced until yesterday...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恭介、オレは誰だ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, who am I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, who am I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「真人だろ…何をいってやがるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You are Masato... What joke is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You are Masato... What joke is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…眠らせてくれ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Let me sleep, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Let me sleep, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人をそうしたのは俺だ。俺がそうなるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't be in the same situation as Masato, because I'm the one that put him through it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't be in the same situation as Masato, because I'm the one that put him through it.

MESSAGE.JP: 三人がひそひそと話しながら、出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of them leave my room, whispering all the while.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of them leave my room, whispering all the while.

MESSAGE.JP: 静寂が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: It becomes quiet in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It becomes quiet in here.

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくは休もう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should rest for a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should rest for a while...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺たちは夢を見続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Our dream still continues.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our dream still continues.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが幸せになるという夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The dream where everybody ends up happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dream where everybody ends up happy.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、いつかは夢からは目覚めないとな…。
MESSAGE.EN: But we're going to have to wake up eventually...
MESSAGE.Translation: But we're going to have to wake up eventually...

MESSAGE.JP: いつまでも、子供のまんまじゃいられないんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: We can't stay children forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: We can't stay children forever...

MESSAGE.JP: 時間は進むし、人は成長していく…。
MESSAGE.EN: Time flows by, and people grow up...
MESSAGE.Translation: Time flows by, and people grow up...

MESSAGE.JP: こんな世界は終わらせよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got to put an end to this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got to put an end to this world...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はおまえにすべてを賭ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to bet everything on you.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to bet everything on you.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺にもできなかったことを…
MESSAGE.EN: I believe that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe that...

MESSAGE.JP: 成し遂げてくれ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...you can achieve what I couldn't...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...you can achieve what I couldn't...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 居続けるのはずっと暗闇の中だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've been in that darkness all along...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've been in that darkness all along...

MESSAGE.JP: 這いずって…這いずって…
MESSAGE.EN: Crawling... and crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: Crawling... and crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: どっちの世界が本物だ？
MESSAGE.EN: Which one of the worlds is real?
MESSAGE.Translation: Which one of the worlds is real?

MESSAGE.JP: 時間は進んでいるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Does time pass by?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does time pass by?

MESSAGE.JP: 明日は来るのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will there be a tomorrow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will there be a tomorrow?

MESSAGE.JP: もう何もかもが、不安になった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm worried about so many things.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm worried about so many things.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、この暗闇の中で同じ場所を這いずり回っているだけじゃないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be that I just keep on crawling in place...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be that I just keep on crawling in place...?

MESSAGE.JP: 同じところをぐるぐると、何度も…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm just going round and round in circles over and over...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm just going round and round in circles over and over...

MESSAGE.JP: その暗闇の底を。
MESSAGE.EN: ...at the bottom of this darkness?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...at the bottom of this darkness?

MESSAGE.JP: 背中に刺すような痛みで目覚めた。
MESSAGE.EN: A stabbing pain on my back wakes me up.
MESSAGE.Translation: A stabbing pain on my back wakes me up.

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたら、現実だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It tells me that I'm in reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: It tells me that I'm in reality.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶望に満ちた世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm in the world filled with despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm in the world filled with despair.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなものに満ちていても、俺は自分にできることはする。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I've got to do what I can here
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I've got to do what I can here

MESSAGE.JP: 少しでも最後の瞬間が訪れるのを遅らせるために。
MESSAGE.EN: so I can delay the last moment for as long as I can.
MESSAGE.Translation: so I can delay the last moment for as long as I can.

MESSAGE.JP: 見上げる景色は相変わらずの暗闇だ。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times it is, all I find is the same darkness when I look up.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times it is, all I find is the same darkness when I look up.

MESSAGE.JP: …ふと、違和感を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I suddenly start feeling something's wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I suddenly start feeling something's wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに俺は這いずって動いていたはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can tell for sure that I've been moving ahead, even slowly as I crawl.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can tell for sure that I've been moving ahead, even slowly as I crawl.

MESSAGE.JP: 全身の痛みに耐え、ひたすらに目指していたはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Bearing all the pain in my body, I've been struggling to reach there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bearing all the pain in my body, I've been struggling to reach there.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、体を起こす気力すら使うのが惜しいはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I should be too tired to even raise my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be too tired to even raise my body.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ俺は、景色を見上げているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, why am I looking up?
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, why am I looking up?

MESSAGE.JP: 痛む腕で、軋む足で、這いつくばって前に進んでいたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I've been worming ahead on my sore arms and legs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've been worming ahead on my sore arms and legs.

MESSAGE.JP: 不安で押しつぶされようとしているだけなのか？
MESSAGE.EN: What is this anxiety that is trying to crush me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is this anxiety that is trying to crush me?

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、俺はそこへ辿りつけないのだろうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I will end up never getting there...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I will end up never getting there...?

MESSAGE.JP: 徒労を積み重ねていくだけなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Am I just wasting my time and energy?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I just wasting my time and energy?

MESSAGE.JP: 心が削られるように磨り減っていくようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel like my mind is getting worn away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel like my mind is getting worn away.

MESSAGE.JP: 諦めるな。
MESSAGE.EN: Still I can't give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still I can't give up.

MESSAGE.JP: 掴み、体を引き摺り上げろ。
MESSAGE.EN: I must pull myself up and keep moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must pull myself up and keep moving.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度でも。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many tries it takes.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many tries it takes.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ…それは『すぐそこ』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes... it is ❛right there.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes... it is ❛right there.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 駄目だ…
MESSAGE.EN: No...
MESSAGE.Translation: No...

MESSAGE.JP: 精一杯だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think I can do this anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think I can do this anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: いつ気を失ってこっちに戻ってしまうかわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know when I passed out and returned to this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know when I passed out and returned to this world...

MESSAGE.JP: すぐにも目覚めたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I need to wake myself up at once...
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to wake myself up at once...

MESSAGE.JP: だが、振り絞った気力は、休まないともう、どこからも湧いてこない…。
MESSAGE.EN: But there's no more strength left within me. I have to rest a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: But there's no more strength left within me. I have to rest a while...

MESSAGE.JP: 目蓋を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I open my eyelids.
MESSAGE.Translation: I open my eyelids.

MESSAGE.JP: 迫るような暗闇に、かすかに見えるぼんやりとした光。
MESSAGE.EN: I can see an indistinct light in the pitch blackness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can see an indistinct light in the pitch blackness.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は仰向けに寝そべっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm lying on my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm lying on my back.

MESSAGE.JP: まただ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Again...

MESSAGE.JP: 戻っている…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm back in here...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm back in here...

MESSAGE.JP: 後少しのところまで辿り着いていたのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was almost there...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was almost there...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はまた『ここ』にいる。
MESSAGE.EN: But now I'm back ❛here❜ yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: But now I'm back ❛here❜ yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No wonder, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: No wonder, though...

MESSAGE.JP: ここにいるから、始まった世界なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is where I began that world.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is where I began that world.

MESSAGE.JP: つまり…
MESSAGE.EN: In other words...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words...

MESSAGE.JP: 永遠の一瞬からは逃れられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I cannot escape this eternal instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cannot escape this eternal instant.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうことか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I understand something now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I understand something now...

MESSAGE.JP: この世界でどれだけ歩みを進めようが、一度でも向こうに行ってしまえばすべてはリセットされる。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many steps I take forward in this world, it will come back to nothing once I go over to the other one.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many steps I take forward in this world, it will come back to nothing once I go over to the other one.

MESSAGE.JP: それは…つじつま合わせだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It happens... so that there is no discrepancy between the two worlds.
MESSAGE.Translation: It happens... so that there is no discrepancy between the two worlds.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は居るべき場所に戻される。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm forced back to where I'm supposed to belong.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm forced back to where I'm supposed to belong.

MESSAGE.JP: そこは、俺のスタート地点で…
MESSAGE.EN: This place is my starting point...
MESSAGE.Translation: This place is my starting point...

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとあいつらと過ごしている場所だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's where I've been sharing my time with them.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's where I've been sharing my time with them.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶望だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no hope...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no hope...

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり俺たちは永遠に遊んでいるしかないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Can we do nothing but stay here for good,
MESSAGE.Translation: Can we do nothing but stay here for good,

MESSAGE.JP: あの満ち足りた夢の中で。
MESSAGE.EN: playing in that flawless, fulfilling dream?
MESSAGE.Translation: playing in that flawless, fulfilling dream?

MESSAGE.JP: そうすればいつまでも楽しくて…
MESSAGE.EN: If so, we could keep having fun forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: If so, we could keep having fun forever...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹、鈴…
MESSAGE.EN: Plus...
MESSAGE.Translation: Plus...

MESSAGE.JP: おまえたちをこんな絶望に突き落とすこともない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki and Rin, they won't have to see despair...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki and Rin, they won't have to see despair...

MESSAGE.JP: それでいいのか…
MESSAGE.EN: Am I really okay with that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I really okay with that...?

MESSAGE.JP: 疲れた…
MESSAGE.EN: I'm so tired...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm so tired...

MESSAGE.JP: もういいよな…
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should give up here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should give up here...

MESSAGE.JP: できることはやったよな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I did all I could...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I did all I could...

MESSAGE.JP: 無駄だってわかったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew it would all be in vain...
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew it would all be in vain...

MESSAGE.JP: ここで諦めよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'll quit here...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'll quit here...

MESSAGE.JP: それでも俺は這いずっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even while thinking that, I'm still crawling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even while thinking that, I'm still crawling.

MESSAGE.JP: 徒労とわかりつつ、俺は何度目か分からない挑戦を繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I know I'm simply wasting my time, but I force myself to keep trying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know I'm simply wasting my time, but I force myself to keep trying.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつだけこの状況を感謝しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: There's only one thing I can be grateful for in this situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's only one thing I can be grateful for in this situation.

MESSAGE.JP: この暗闇の世界ですら、見えるものは何一つ変わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in this dark world, the things I can sense never change.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in this dark world, the things I can sense never change.

MESSAGE.JP: 薄く差し込む光の位置、手に食い込む岩、充満する油の臭い。
MESSAGE.EN: The point at which the watery light is shining, the rock that stabbed my hand, and the smell of the gasoline permeating the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: The point at which the watery light is shining, the rock that stabbed my hand, and the smell of the gasoline permeating the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 全てが同一だ。
MESSAGE.EN: They are all unchanged from the first.
MESSAGE.Translation: They are all unchanged from the first.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度でも目的地まで試してやる。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to keep trying until I reach there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to keep trying until I reach there.

MESSAGE.JP: まだやれることはあるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There should still be something I can do...
MESSAGE.Translation: There should still be something I can do...

MESSAGE.JP: 心さえ、折れなければ。
MESSAGE.EN: as long as my mind does not shatter.
MESSAGE.Translation: as long as my mind does not shatter.

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介、いる…？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kyousuke, you there...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke, you there...?

MESSAGE.JP: また彼方から声がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I hear somebody's voice from afar again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hear somebody's voice from afar again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹か…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: よし…待ってろ…。
MESSAGE.EN: All right... I'll be right over...
MESSAGE.Translation: All right... I'll be right over...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はその場所へと戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I come back to the other world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I come back to the other world.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ひとりか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You came alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You came alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: また驚かせてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like I surprised him once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like I surprised him once again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしていつも、そんなところにいるのさ…恐いよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How are you always back there...? You scared me out of my wits...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How are you always back there...? You scared me out of my wits...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いきなりそこに現れたほうが恐いだろーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You'd be much more scared if I were to suddenly pop up from the bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You'd be much more scared if I were to suddenly pop up from the bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃそうだけど、どっちにしろ悪趣味だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true, but I still don't really like that way you appear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true, but I still don't really like that way you appear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなところで何してるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寝てなくて大丈夫なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you need to get sleep?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you need to get sleep?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ずっと寝てるような生活さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, I've been doing nothing but sleeping lately...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, I've been doing nothing but sleeping lately...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんかあったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is something bothering you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is something bothering you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はそう訊いてからしまった、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I instantly regret asking that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I instantly regret asking that.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は今戦っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki is fighting right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki is fighting right now.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺がその身を案じてしまえば、理樹の強さが折れてしまうかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If he finds out I'm worried about him, it could make him weak.
MESSAGE.Translation: If he finds out I'm worried about him, it could make him weak.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は病人の振りをし続けておけばよかったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should have just continued pretending to be sick...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should have just continued pretending to be sick...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹のその両眼に今にも零れそうな涙が浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can see tears about to overflow from the corners of his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can see tears about to overflow from the corners of his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありすぎるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All too many things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All too many things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わかってる。
MESSAGE.EN: I know.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know.

MESSAGE.JP: わかってるから、理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: I do know, Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: I do know, Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: 泣くな、理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: So don't you cry, Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: So don't you cry, Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: 泣いて立ち止まってなんかいる暇はないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: You have no time to stop and cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: You have no time to stop and cry.

MESSAGE.JP: 行くんだ、理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: You have to keep going, Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: You have to keep going, Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃ俺だって、抱きしめてやりたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I could hug you right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I could hug you right now.

MESSAGE.JP: ――よしよし、よく頑張ったな。
MESSAGE.EN: ――There, there, you've done well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――There, there, you've done well.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言ってやれたら、どれだけおまえは報われるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How rewarded would it make you feel if I were to praise you right now?
MESSAGE.Translation: How rewarded would it make you feel if I were to praise you right now?

MESSAGE.JP: ――よし。理樹、ついてこい。俺が倒してやる。
MESSAGE.EN: ――All right, Riki, just follow me. I'll take down your enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――All right, Riki, just follow me. I'll take down your enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言ってやれたら、どれだけおまえは安心できるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How secure would you feel if I were to tell you that right now?
MESSAGE.Translation: How secure would you feel if I were to tell you that right now?

MESSAGE.JP: でも、堪えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I hold myself back,
MESSAGE.Translation: But I hold myself back,

MESSAGE.JP: 歯を食いしばって。
MESSAGE.EN: gritting my teeth.
MESSAGE.Translation: gritting my teeth.

MESSAGE.JP: それは理樹も同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So does he.
MESSAGE.Translation: So does he.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちゃんと食べてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Be sure to eat properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Be sure to eat properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返るが、声は震えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: His voice is shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: His voice is shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後にそれだけを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, that's all he says to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, that's all he says to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあね、また」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あまりにも心許ない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can tell he needs help...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can tell he needs help...

MESSAGE.JP: 手がかりひとつなく、道しるべを失ったか。
MESSAGE.EN: He's completely clueless and without direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's completely clueless and without direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はな…
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo is...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo is...

MESSAGE.JP: もっと単純なんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...much simpler than you probably are thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...much simpler than you probably are thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…謙吾はひとつだけ嘘をついている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Kengo told you one lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Kengo told you one lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヒントをくれてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I give him a hint.
MESSAGE.Translation: I give him a hint.

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけスタート地点に戻ろうとも…
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how many times I've started over by now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how many times I've started over by now...

MESSAGE.JP: 這う…
MESSAGE.EN: But I keep crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I keep crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: …這う…
MESSAGE.EN: ...crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: 這う…
MESSAGE.EN: crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: 這い続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: just crawling ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: just crawling ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ風景ばかり見続けているからだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I picture something while moving...
MESSAGE.Translation: I picture something while moving...

MESSAGE.JP: 体を動かしつつも、妄想にふける…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it's because all I keep seeing is the same scenery...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it's because all I keep seeing is the same scenery...

MESSAGE.JP: それはこの絶望に打ち勝とうとする、ふたりの姿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I picture the two of them struggling to overcome this despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picture the two of them struggling to overcome this despair.

MESSAGE.JP: その場の機転で、いくつも妙案を出す理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki, whose mind runs well in every situation...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki, whose mind runs well in every situation...

MESSAGE.JP: まずはこの絶望の中でも落ち着いてみせ…
MESSAGE.EN: First he calms himself down amidst this horrible scene...
MESSAGE.Translation: First he calms himself down amidst this horrible scene...

MESSAGE.JP: そして、木々の枝を折り、担架を作り出す…。
MESSAGE.EN: And he collects branches and makes a stretcher...
MESSAGE.Translation: And he collects branches and makes a stretcher...

MESSAGE.JP: 隣には…鈴を置こうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin is by his side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin is by his side.

MESSAGE.JP: 乗客の荷物から使えそうなものを取り出し、いろんな人の手当てをしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: She searches the other passengers' bags for useful items and uses them to treat the injured ones...
MESSAGE.Translation: She searches the other passengers' bags for useful items and uses them to treat the injured ones...

MESSAGE.JP: それは本当に夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It really is just a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really is just a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺自身を奮い立たせるための。
MESSAGE.EN: I merely imagine it to give myself courage.
MESSAGE.Translation: I merely imagine it to give myself courage.

MESSAGE.JP: もしそんなことを始めたら、すべてが終わる。
MESSAGE.EN: If they actually did that, everything would be without meaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: If they actually did that, everything would be without meaning.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺が這いずってる意味も…
MESSAGE.EN: The meaning of me crawling...
MESSAGE.Translation: The meaning of me crawling...

MESSAGE.JP: いろんなものを踏みにじってきた罪も…
MESSAGE.EN: My sins in trampling down many things underfoot...
MESSAGE.Translation: My sins in trampling down many things underfoot...

MESSAGE.JP: すべてが台無しだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: They will all be for naught...
MESSAGE.Translation: They will all be for naught...

MESSAGE.JP: 無駄にしてくれるんじゃないぞ…
MESSAGE.EN: Never make it so...
MESSAGE.Translation: Never make it so...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「恭介、でてこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, show yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, show yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした…ここにいるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What is it...? I'm here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What is it...? I'm here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その日の遅く、謙吾が押しかけてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Late in the night, Kengo barges into my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Late in the night, Kengo barges into my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹は、うまく嘘を暴けた。そういうことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It means that Riki succeeded in unveiling his lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: It means that Riki succeeded in unveiling his lie.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹が、野球で勝負を挑んできた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki's challenged me to a game of baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki's challenged me to a game of baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえとも同じ勝負をした。覚えているか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I did the same thing with you. Remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I did the same thing with you. Remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あの時、おまえは何をした？　それも覚えているか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And what you did to me at that time. You remember that, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And what you did to me at that time. You remember that, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たしか雨でコールドゲームだったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I believe the game was called due to rain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I believe the game was called due to rain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それもおまえの筋書き通りだったわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That was also part of your plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That was also part of your plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえは禁じ手を使って、勝った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You broke a taboo to win.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You broke a taboo to win.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ…そうだったっけか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah... I guess so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah... I guess so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何を朦朧とした振りをしてるんだ、ちゃんと思い出せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Stop pretending to be groggy. There's no way you don't remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Stop pretending to be groggy. There's no way you don't remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 覚えてるさ…。あんな卑怯な勝ち方を忘れるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course I do... How could I forget about using such a dirty trick?
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course I do... How could I forget about using such a dirty trick?

MESSAGE.JP: ただ朦朧としているのは…俺の気力があっちで費やされてるためだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I really am groggy... because of what I'm doing in the other world...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I really am groggy... because of what I'm doing in the other world...

MESSAGE.JP: あんなことをしながら元気でいられるものか。
MESSAGE.EN: How can I not be tired after doing that?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can I not be tired after doing that?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえは、禁じ手を使い、俺を欺いた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You deceived me by breaking a taboo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You deceived me by breaking a taboo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しかも、俺の触れてはならない部分に土足であがった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's more, you infringed upon my privacy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's more, you infringed upon my privacy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …古式みゆき。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Miyuki Koshiki.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Miyuki Koshiki.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「でも理樹には、同じことはできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But Riki cannot do the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But Riki cannot do the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹は何も知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He doesn't know anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He doesn't know anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「今も、何も知らないままなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even now, he doesn't know anything at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even now, he doesn't know anything at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんな奴に何ができる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What can someone like him possibly do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What can someone like him possibly do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…何が言いたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Are you trying to make a point?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Are you trying to make a point?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「悪いが、勝負は勝つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but the victory will be mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Sorry, but the victory will be mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そしてリトルバスターズは解散だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And the Little Busters will be through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And the Little Busters will be through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それで、終わりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And that's it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And that's it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…それだけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Is that everything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Is that everything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もうひとつ条件をつける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝One more condition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝One more condition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…何だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺が勝ったら…そんな病んだ振りはやめて、おまえも戻ってこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If I win... you'll stop pretending to be sick like that and join us again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If I win... you'll stop pretending to be sick like that and join us again.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだおまえは…。あいつら以上に子供じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Seriously... you're even more of a child than the others.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seriously... you're even more of a child than the others.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…それもいいかもしれないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Wouldn't that be nice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Wouldn't that be nice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「答えろ、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Your answer, Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Your answer, Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Accepted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Accepted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「約束だぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't break your word...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't break your word...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「話は以上だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We're done here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We're done here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん。
MESSAGE.EN: He closes the door behind him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He closes the door behind him.

MESSAGE.JP: また暗闇に視界は閉ざされる。
MESSAGE.EN: Darkness engulfs me again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Darkness engulfs me again.

MESSAGE.JP: 戻ろう…
MESSAGE.EN: I should get back...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should get back...

MESSAGE.JP: 闇のただ中に。
MESSAGE.EN: right into that other darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: right into that other darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 額に濡れた感触があったかと思うと、目に射すような痛みが走った。
MESSAGE.EN: Right as I feel a moistness on my forehead, my eyes hurt as if being stabbed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right as I feel a moistness on my forehead, my eyes hurt as if being stabbed.

MESSAGE.JP: 傷口から流れ出した血が、目に入ったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently blood is trickling down my forehead, and some of it has gotten into my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently blood is trickling down my forehead, and some of it has gotten into my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 手はもう傷と泥で覆われている。
MESSAGE.EN: My hands are full of wounds and covered in mud.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hands are full of wounds and covered in mud.

MESSAGE.JP: 肩口で沁みる目を擦り、探し続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Rubbing my stinging eyes with my shoulders, I keep searching for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rubbing my stinging eyes with my shoulders, I keep searching for it.

MESSAGE.JP: 今は痛みでさえありがたい。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, I welcome the pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, I welcome the pain.

MESSAGE.JP: 新しい刺激なら、これが本物だと感じられる。
MESSAGE.EN: Because feeling it tells me that I'm in reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because feeling it tells me that I'm in reality.

MESSAGE.JP: 足をたわませ、伸ばしながら進む。
MESSAGE.EN: I move by bending my legs and stretching them in turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: I move by bending my legs and stretching them in turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 起き上がることさえできない俺が進む、唯一の方法だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I can't even get to my feet, that's the only way I can advance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I can't even get to my feet, that's the only way I can advance.

MESSAGE.JP: 鼻につく臭いがひときわ強くなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The more progress I make, the stronger the foul smell grows.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more progress I make, the stronger the foul smell grows.

MESSAGE.JP: 辿り付いた先に手を伸ばすと、破れた金属片が刺さった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I reach its source, a piece of metal sticks me in the hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I reach its source, a piece of metal sticks me in the hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 熱い。手を離す。
MESSAGE.EN: It's hot. I draw my hand back.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's hot. I draw my hand back.

MESSAGE.JP: 濡れた感触だけが残る。
MESSAGE.EN: I can only feel a wetness on my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can only feel a wetness on my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: これか…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is it...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is it...

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく辿り着けた…。
MESSAGE.EN: At long last, I've gotten here...
MESSAGE.Translation: At long last, I've gotten here...

MESSAGE.JP: これさえ塞げればいいのか。
MESSAGE.EN: This is what I have to cover up.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is what I have to cover up.

MESSAGE.JP: なら、この背中でいいんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I think I can use my back for doing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I think I can use my back for doing it.

MESSAGE.JP: 体重をかけてもたれかかれば、浸みだしてくるのも食い止められる…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I put my weight on it, I should be able to stop the liquid from leaking...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I put my weight on it, I should be able to stop the liquid from leaking...

MESSAGE.JP: だが、直接は熱すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: But I need something to put between it and myself, because it's too hot to touch directly.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I need something to put between it and myself, because it's too hot to touch directly.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は…転がりながらぼろぼろになった上着を脱いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I... take off my jacket by rolling onto my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... take off my jacket by rolling onto my side.

MESSAGE.JP: それを折りたたみ、熱くなった金属に当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I fold and hold that against the heated metal.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fold and hold that against the heated metal.

MESSAGE.JP: そこへ倒れ込むように、体重を掛けて背中からもたれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I then lean my back against it with all my weight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I then lean my back against it with all my weight.

MESSAGE.JP: はぁ…大仕事だった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Phew... It was a hard task...
MESSAGE.Translation: Phew... It was a hard task...

MESSAGE.JP: だが、これでいい。
MESSAGE.EN: But I'm finished now.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I'm finished now.

MESSAGE.JP: このまま俺は待っていればいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: All I have left to do is just waiting here...
MESSAGE.Translation: All I have left to do is just waiting here...

MESSAGE.JP: …いや。
俺は馬鹿だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm such an idiot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm such an idiot.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなことをしても無駄なんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no point in doing this...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no point in doing this...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺がまた気を失えば、すべては巻き戻る…。
MESSAGE.EN: Once I pass out again, everything will go back to the way it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: Once I pass out again, everything will go back to the way it was...

MESSAGE.JP: 必死に脱いだ上着も元通り俺が着て…。
MESSAGE.EN: I will have the jacket back on me...
MESSAGE.Translation: I will have the jacket back on me...

MESSAGE.JP: スタート地点へ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and return to the starting point...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and return to the starting point...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はこの『穴』を塞ぐため、ここに居続けなければならないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I've got to stay here to cover this ❛hole.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: But I've got to stay here to cover this ❛hole.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そこに戻されては、ここまでやってきた意味がないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I get back there, all I've done so far will go to waste.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I get back there, all I've done so far will go to waste.

MESSAGE.JP: どうすればいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do...?

MESSAGE.JP: ここに居続けたいんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I must stay here...
MESSAGE.Translation: I must stay here...

MESSAGE.JP: 考えろ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Think...
MESSAGE.Translation: Think...

MESSAGE.JP: その方法なら…
MESSAGE.EN: Wait...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつだけあるじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: there is just one way to make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: there is just one way to make it.

MESSAGE.JP: スタート地点とは…俺の死に場所だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The starting point means... the place where I'm going to die.
MESSAGE.Translation: The starting point means... the place where I'm going to die.

MESSAGE.JP: なら、それをリセットして、ここをもう一度スタート地点にすればいいだけじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I think the problem will get solved if only I reset my starting point to this place.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I think the problem will get solved if only I reset my starting point to this place.

MESSAGE.JP: ここを俺の『死に場所』に。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning this point to ❛the place where I'm going to die.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning this point to ❛the place where I'm going to die.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうすれば俺の役目は果たされ続けるんじゃないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I do that, there's a chance that my mission will be accomplished...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I do that, there's a chance that my mission will be accomplished...

MESSAGE.JP: はっは…オーケー。
MESSAGE.EN: Haha... Okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haha... Okay.

MESSAGE.JP: すでに絶望的な光景には慣れていたはずだが、それ以上の状況に笑いさえ込み上げてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I'm already used to seeing this desperate scene around me, it's starting to make me feel like laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I'm already used to seeing this desperate scene around me, it's starting to make me feel like laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: なんとかしてやろうじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to do it somehow...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to do it somehow...

MESSAGE.JP: あの『一瞬』をこの手でもう一度ここで再現する。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll recreate that ❛instant❜ right here once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll recreate that ❛instant❜ right here once again.

MESSAGE.JP: そうして俺は新しくこの場所から参加する。向こうの世界に。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I'll come back into the other world from right here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I'll come back into the other world from right here.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、ここが新しいスタート地点となり、俺はここに居続けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: By doing that, I'll be set to a new starting point and be able to stay here.
MESSAGE.Translation: By doing that, I'll be set to a new starting point and be able to stay here.

MESSAGE.JP: 左手はもう用を為さない。
MESSAGE.EN: My left hand is of no use anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: My left hand is of no use anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 血の滲む目は見えていないが、右手であたりを探る。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't see because of the blood, but I can use my right hand to grope around for something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't see because of the blood, but I can use my right hand to grope around for something.

MESSAGE.JP: 軽い熱さと痛みが走る。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel a spike of heat and pain in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel a spike of heat and pain in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は右腕で掴んだ何かを持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pick up the thing I've found.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pick up the thing I've found.

MESSAGE.JP: …鋭く尖ったガラス片。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It is a sharp, pointed shard of glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It is a sharp, pointed shard of glass.

MESSAGE.JP: これならいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: This will do.
MESSAGE.Translation: This will do.

MESSAGE.JP: こいつで、俺はあの一瞬を繰り返そう。
MESSAGE.EN: I can use this thing to repeat that ❛instant.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I can use this thing to repeat that ❛instant.❜

MESSAGE.JP: それは気を失う、なんて生やさしいものじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's going to require something way beyond passing out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's going to require something way beyond passing out.

MESSAGE.JP: もっとリアルな『死』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's going to require a ❛death❜ that is much more real.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's going to require a ❛death❜ that is much more real.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は渾身の力をこめて、右手を振り下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: I swing my right hand down toward the glass
MESSAGE.Translation: I swing my right hand down toward the glass

MESSAGE.JP: 世界の始まりをもう一度我が手にするために。
MESSAGE.EN: to make the world begin yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: to make the world begin yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 光が射した。
MESSAGE.EN: I can see a light.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can see a light.

MESSAGE.JP: それは太陽か？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it the sun?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it the sun?

MESSAGE.JP: 眩しすぎる…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's too bright...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's too bright...

MESSAGE.JP: ここはどこだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where am I...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where am I...?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺はどうなった…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's happened to me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's happened to me...?

MESSAGE.JP: 教えてくれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone tell me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone tell me...

MESSAGE.JP: その光の中に、そいつは居た。
MESSAGE.EN: There he is in the light.
MESSAGE.Translation: There he is in the light.

MESSAGE.JP: …直枝理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Riki Naoe.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Riki Naoe.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ついにきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're finally here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're finally here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「助けにきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're here to rescue you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're here to rescue you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 凛とした声。
MESSAGE.EN: His voice is strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: His voice is strong.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな世界でも、それは力強い。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in this world, it carries power.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in this world, it carries power.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らはリトルバスターズだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒にいこう、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come with us, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come with us, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと見上げた先には理樹の顔。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly raise my head and find his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly raise my head and find his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 手が差し伸べられている。
MESSAGE.EN: He's holding his hand out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's holding his hand out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: その後ろには鈴、謙吾、真人の姿。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind him are Rin, Kengo and Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind him are Rin, Kengo and Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: やってみせたのか…理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: So you've done it all... Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: So you've done it all... Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: なんて頼もしくなったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How reliable you have become.
MESSAGE.Translation: How reliable you have become.

MESSAGE.JP: この世界が始まった頃からは考えられない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I never thought you'd grow so strong when we started this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: I never thought you'd grow so strong when we started this world...

MESSAGE.JP: 何度繰り返してきただろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How many times did we repeat...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many times did we repeat...?

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も繰り返してようやく辿りついた…。
MESSAGE.EN: After those countless repetitions, you are finally here...
MESSAGE.Translation: After those countless repetitions, you are finally here...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺だって、しくじったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even I failed...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even I failed...

MESSAGE.JP: すごいな、理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: You're amazing, Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: You're amazing, Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: おまえは俺を追い抜いていったんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: You've already overtaken me...
MESSAGE.Translation: You've already overtaken me...

MESSAGE.JP: 全部無駄じゃなかったんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: What we have been doing hasn't been meaningless...
MESSAGE.Translation: What we have been doing hasn't been meaningless...

MESSAGE.JP: よかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank god...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank god...

MESSAGE.JP: 差し伸べられた手…。
MESSAGE.EN: Once I seize your hand...
MESSAGE.Translation: Once I seize your hand...

MESSAGE.JP: それを掴めば、すべてが終わり、すべてが始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...everything will end, and everything will begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...everything will end, and everything will begin.

MESSAGE.JP: それは想像を絶する過酷の始まりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It'll be the beginning of something cruel beyond all imagination.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'll be the beginning of something cruel beyond all imagination.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにはもう俺も謙吾も真人もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: There won't be me, Kengo or Masato there. Nobody.
MESSAGE.Translation: There won't be me, Kengo or Masato there. Nobody.

MESSAGE.JP: でも今の理樹なら…
MESSAGE.EN: But if it's you as you are now...
MESSAGE.Translation: But if it's you as you are now...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹…
MESSAGE.EN: Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: 大丈夫だよな？
MESSAGE.EN: You'll be fine, won't you?
MESSAGE.Translation: You'll be fine, won't you?

MESSAGE.JP: ここまできたんだから…
MESSAGE.EN: We've finally gotten this far...
MESSAGE.Translation: We've finally gotten this far...

MESSAGE.JP: 掴んでもいいよな？
MESSAGE.EN: So can I take your hand?
MESSAGE.Translation: So can I take your hand?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺もこの道を信じてきたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I've always believed that this day would come.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've always believed that this day would come.

MESSAGE.JP: この方法だけを信じてきたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've held faith that this was the only way to make you grow...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've held faith that this was the only way to make you grow...

MESSAGE.JP: いいよな…？
MESSAGE.EN: So it's okay, isn't it...?
MESSAGE.Translation: So it's okay, isn't it...?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は合ってたよな？
MESSAGE.EN: I was correct, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: I was correct, right?

MESSAGE.JP: 間違ってなかったよな？
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't wrong, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't wrong, right?

MESSAGE.JP: それを証明してくれるよな？
MESSAGE.EN: You'll prove it for me, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: You'll prove it for me, right?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺たちのいなくなった世界でも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in the world without us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in the world without us...

MESSAGE.JP: 後は頼んだぞ…
MESSAGE.EN: I'm counting on you...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm counting on you...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は手を伸ばし…
MESSAGE.EN: I stretch out my arm...
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretch out my arm...

MESSAGE.JP: 掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and take his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and take his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは渡り廊下を進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: We were walking down the connecting corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were walking down the connecting corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「これからどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What do we do now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What do we do now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでもいいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anything is fine by me, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anything is fine by me, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱ野球かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I guess we should play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I guess we should play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、いいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, good idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, good idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「さすが理樹。わかってるじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's our Riki. You do know what to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's our Riki. You do know what to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしがピッチャーだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll be the pitcher!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll be the pitcher!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、グラウンドに出よう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, let's get to the field.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, let's get to the field.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちの後ろには、最後に仲間になった恭介がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind the four of us walked Kyousuke, the fifth member of our team.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind the four of us walked Kyousuke, the fifth member of our team.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は歩を緩めて近づいていくと、その手を握ってやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped to his side and took hold of his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped to his side and took hold of his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介、野球だよ、いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, let's go play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, let's go play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩く校舎は静かだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The school was wrapped in total silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school was wrapped in total silence.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、僕たち以外、誰もいないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like there's nobody else in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like there's nobody else in here.

MESSAGE.JP: 人影すら目につかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't seen anyone on the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't seen anyone on the way.

MESSAGE.JP: もしそうだとしても、なんだかそれでもいい気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if no one else is there, I don't care.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if no one else is there, I don't care.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はリトルバスターズを取り戻したんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I've got the Little Busters back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I've got the Little Busters back.

MESSAGE.JP: カィン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 痛烈なゴロ。
MESSAGE.EN: A powerful grounder.
MESSAGE.Translation: A powerful grounder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「セカンド、謙吾！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Second, Kengo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Second, Kengo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「任せろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Leave it to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Leave it to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: バックハンドで取り、腕だけのスローイングでファーストの真人へ。
MESSAGE.EN: He catches the ball backhanded and throws it to Masato at first base.
MESSAGE.Translation: He catches the ball backhanded and throws it to Masato at first base.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱしっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Catch*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Catch*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ナイスピッチ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nice pitching!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nice pitching!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再び鈴へ。
MESSAGE.EN: And the ball gets back to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the ball gets back to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: これがこの世界の最後の光景。
MESSAGE.EN: So this is the last scene of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: So this is the last scene of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪くない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙が出そうなほどに、無邪気で、子供らしい光景だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Its childlike innocence and purity is making me want to cry...
MESSAGE.Translation: Its childlike innocence and purity is making me want to cry...

MESSAGE.JP: リトルバスターズの終焉には相応しすぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't ask for anything more perfect for the end of us, the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't ask for anything more perfect for the end of us, the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: でもこの世界を機能させていくためにはもう、人数も足りていない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no longer enough people left to keep this world going.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no longer enough people left to keep this world going.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで野球と同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just like a baseball team.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just like a baseball team.

MESSAGE.JP: 何が欠けても、狂いが生じる。
MESSAGE.EN: If any one of them is gone, the whole can't function well.
MESSAGE.Translation: If any one of them is gone, the whole can't function well.

MESSAGE.JP: 人がいないのも、そう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not only about people.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not only about people.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫がいないのもそう。
MESSAGE.EN: If the cats disappear,
MESSAGE.Translation: If the cats disappear,

MESSAGE.JP: 空が動かないのもそう。
MESSAGE.EN: or if the clouds stop moving,
MESSAGE.Translation: or if the clouds stop moving,

MESSAGE.JP: 世界は壊れ始めている。
MESSAGE.EN: the world starts getting out of order.
MESSAGE.Translation: the world starts getting out of order.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、この光景だけは守ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I wish to protect this scene that I'm seeing now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I wish to protect this scene that I'm seeing now.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後のその時まで。
MESSAGE.EN: Until the very end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until the very end.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後の５人の姿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the last moment we can share together.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the last moment we can share together.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は今にも泣きそうな顔をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo seems about to burst into tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo seems about to burst into tears.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえが一番の甘ちゃんだったな。
MESSAGE.EN: Among all of us, you really are the biggest crybaby.
MESSAGE.Translation: Among all of us, you really are the biggest crybaby.

MESSAGE.JP: 泣き虫で、意地っ張りで、あまのじゃくで。
MESSAGE.EN: Obstinate and twisted, but quick to tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obstinate and twisted, but quick to tears.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、十分遊んだだろ？
MESSAGE.EN: But you played enough, didn't you?
MESSAGE.Translation: But you played enough, didn't you?

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しかったよな。
MESSAGE.EN: It was fun, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: It was fun, right?

MESSAGE.JP: 俺もおまえと遊べて最高に楽しかったぜ。
MESSAGE.EN: I also had a lot of fun playing with you.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also had a lot of fun playing with you.

MESSAGE.JP: どすっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔面に牽制球を受ける真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato receives a pickoff ball in the face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato receives a pickoff ball in the face.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鈴…牽制はプレートをはずしてからだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin... you have to leave the pitcher's plate before you make a pickoff throw...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin... you have to leave the pitcher's plate before you make a pickoff throw...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながらも、球を返す。
MESSAGE.EN: He throws back, explaining.
MESSAGE.Translation: He throws back, explaining.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人、おまえもよくやってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, you did such an awesome job, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, you did such an awesome job, too.

MESSAGE.JP: すべてを知っていようが、今まで通りのおまえでいてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite knowing everything, you never ceased to be the way you always are.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite knowing everything, you never ceased to be the way you always are.

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿をやり続けてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: You've never stopped your tomfoolery.
MESSAGE.Translation: You've never stopped your tomfoolery.

MESSAGE.JP: そうしてこの世界での日常を支えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: And you've been helping maintain this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: And you've been helping maintain this world.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対俺たちだけでは支えきれなかったものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Without you, we wouldn't have made it here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without you, we wouldn't have made it here.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえの馬鹿はみんなを幸せにする。
MESSAGE.EN: Your silliness brings everyone happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Your silliness brings everyone happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: それがわかっただろ？
MESSAGE.EN: You know that, don't you?
MESSAGE.Translation: You know that, don't you?

MESSAGE.JP: 愛すべき馬鹿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: You're such a loveable idiot.
MESSAGE.Translation: You're such a loveable idiot.

MESSAGE.JP: 俺も最高に愛してるぜ。
MESSAGE.EN: I love you so much also.
MESSAGE.Translation: I love you so much also.

MESSAGE.JP: 後は、理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: And Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: And Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴をよろしくな。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to leave Rin to you.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to leave Rin to you.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえになら、鈴をやるぜ。
MESSAGE.EN: If it's you, I have no second thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it's you, I have no second thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: おまえのほうが大変だろうけどな。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I know you'll be the one going through hard times.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I know you'll be the one going through hard times.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、ふたりなら幸せになれると思うぜ。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I think you two will be happy together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I think you two will be happy together.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなふうに言いたいことはたくさんあるがな…
MESSAGE.EN: I have so many more things that I want to tell you guys...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have so many more things that I want to tell you guys...

MESSAGE.JP: 言わないでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I think I won't...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I think I won't...

MESSAGE.JP: 最後まで、いつもの俺のままでいよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should stay the way I always am until the end...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should stay the way I always am until the end...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は謙吾と真人に目配せを送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I give Kengo and Masato a look.
MESSAGE.Translation: I give Kengo and Masato a look.

MESSAGE.JP: 指を一本立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I lift one finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lift one finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 残り一球ずつだ。
MESSAGE.EN: One ball for each.
MESSAGE.Translation: One ball for each.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of them nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of them nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がセットアップに構える。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin winds up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin winds up.

MESSAGE.JP: ここで牽制は投げてやるなよ。
MESSAGE.EN: You're not throwing a pickoff throw this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: You're not throwing a pickoff throw this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後にしてはちと酷だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's going to be a little cruel for his last ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's going to be a little cruel for his last ball.

MESSAGE.JP: しゅっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Throw*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Throw*.

MESSAGE.JP: バッターの理樹に向けて投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She pitches toward Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pitches toward Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: カン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 打ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: He hits a fly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He hits a fly.

MESSAGE.JP: 一塁側ベンチのほうにトップフライが舞い上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball glides toward first base.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball glides toward first base.

MESSAGE.JP: 見送ればファールだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's going to be a foul.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's going to be a foul.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、真人はそれを追いかけていく。
MESSAGE.EN: But Masato runs for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Masato runs for it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「危ないって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Watch out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Watch out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: 段差に躓いて、転げながらも、それをキャッチしてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although he trips over and rolls on the ground, he manages to catch the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although he trips over and rolls on the ground, he manages to catch the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: そうか…。最後までおまえは、自分らしさを守るか。
MESSAGE.EN: I see... You stayed true to yourself until this very moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see... You stayed true to yourself until this very moment.

MESSAGE.JP: すげぇよ。心から拍手を送るぜ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm impressed. I applaud you from the bottom of my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm impressed. I applaud you from the bottom of my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、大丈夫!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, you all right!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, you all right!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「平気さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 泥まみれになって起きあがる。
MESSAGE.EN: He stands up, covered in mud.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stands up, covered in mud.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて…こいつを掴んじまったらもう去らなくちゃいけねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well... I caught this, so it's time for me to go now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well... I caught this, so it's time for me to go now.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お別れだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's our time to part, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's our time to part, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なにをいってるの…真人…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about... Masato...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about... Masato...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えーとな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Um, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Um, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 改まったように話を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: He starts speaking what he has on his mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: He starts speaking what he has on his mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえとルームメイトになれてよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It was awesome being your roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It was awesome being your roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「長い時間、一緒に過ごせてよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm happy to have spent all this time with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm happy to have spent all this time with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ、真人…どこかにいっちゃうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on. Masato, are you... going somewhere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on. Masato, are you... going somewhere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「俺はおまえと過ごせてよかったと思ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm really glad that I have gotten to be with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm really glad that I have gotten to be with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 聞きづらそうに鼻をかく。
MESSAGE.EN: He seems hesitant to ask something.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seems hesitant to ask something.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…理樹のほうはどうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What about you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What about you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃもちろん…僕もだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course... So am I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course... So am I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人がルームメイトだから、こんなに寮生活が楽しかったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks to you, my life in the dorm has been so much fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks to you, my life in the dorm has been so much fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人じゃなかったらありえないよ、こんな楽しい生活…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was only possible because I had you as my roommate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was only possible because I had you as my roommate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What should I say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What should I say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すげぇ嬉しいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm so happy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm so happy...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、どこにも行かないよね、真人は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato, you're not going anywhere, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato, you're not going anywhere, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こんな馬鹿と一緒に過ごしてくれて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...that you have been sharing your time with someone stupid like me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...that you have been sharing your time with someone stupid like me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がボールを投げ返す。
MESSAGE.EN: He throws the ball back.
MESSAGE.Translation: He throws the ball back.

MESSAGE.JP: その大きな体が…
MESSAGE.EN: His gigantic frame...
MESSAGE.Translation: His gigantic frame...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...vanishes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...vanishes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、あれっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何が起きたの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、真人がいなくなった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ma-Masato, he just disappeared!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ma-Masato, he just disappeared!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、みんな、探してよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, everybody look for him!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, everybody look for him!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が消えちゃったよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato is gone!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato is gone!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、何をうろたえてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、真人が、真人が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, Masato, he's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, Masato, he's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえがその強さで辿りついた場所がここだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is the place you've reached with your strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is the place you've reached with your strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なにをいってるのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What are you saying...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What are you saying...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これからおまえは、『何かが起きた世界』へと向かう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're now coming back to ❛the world where something happened.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're now coming back to ❛the world where something happened.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そこが本当の世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And that's the real world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And that's the real world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この世界は偽りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This world is a fake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This world is a fake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちが作り出した世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's something we built.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's something we built.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいか、よく聞け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Listen up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Listen up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「生き残るのは、理樹、そして鈴、おまえたちふたりだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you and Rin will be the only survivors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you and Rin will be the only survivors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「生き残るのは、理樹、そして鈴、おまえたちふたりだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you and Rin will be the only survivors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you and Rin will be the only survivors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突然の恭介の言葉に…僕は愕然とする。
MESSAGE.EN: His sudden confession... shocked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: His sudden confession... shocked me.

MESSAGE.JP: 何を言い出すんだ…恭介…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's that all about, Kyousuke...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's that all about, Kyousuke...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんなの…わけがわからないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is that...? I have no idea what you are talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is that...? I have no idea what you are talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「修学旅行のバスが崖から転落したんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A bus fell off a cliff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A bus fell off a cliff.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこかで聞いた話だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard of something like that before...
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard of something like that before...

MESSAGE.JP: 確か春休み明けの全校集会で伝えられた…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I remember correctly, the school made an announcement about it after the spring break ended...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I remember correctly, the school made an announcement about it after the spring break ended...

MESSAGE.JP: その後、僕も図書室でその新聞を読んだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: And I read a newspaper article about the incident in the library afterward...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I read a newspaper article about the incident in the library afterward...

MESSAGE.JP: それは…。
MESSAGE.EN: According to the article...
MESSAGE.Translation: According to the article...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「併設校に通っていた、とあるグループが、旅行先で事故に遭った…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The accident happened to a group of students from our sister school during their field trip...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The accident happened to a group of students from our sister school during their field trip...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちに起きたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It happened to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It happened to us.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Eh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちは、助からない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We aren't going to make it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We aren't going to make it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえたちふたりだけは、真人と謙吾が身を挺して守ったおかげで九死に一生を得た」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Only you and her. You two narrowly escaped death because Masato and Kengo guarded you with their lives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Only you and her. You two narrowly escaped death because Masato and Kengo guarded you with their lives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だが、おまえたちふたりだけを残して俺たちは死ぬわけにはいかなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But we couldn't let ourselves die with you two left behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But we couldn't let ourselves die with you two left behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえたちは弱すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You were both too weak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You were both too weak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「目覚めと共に絶望してしまう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I knew you'd both awaken to a world of despair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I knew you'd both awaken to a world of despair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、俺たちはこの世界を作り出した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Therefore, we have created this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Therefore, we have created this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わけがわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: He was making no sense...
MESSAGE.Translation: He was making no sense...

MESSAGE.JP: この『世界』を作り出した？
MESSAGE.EN: They created this ❛world❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: They created this ❛world❜?

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに…おかしな点はいっぱいあった…。
MESSAGE.EN: But, looking back... there were a lot of things that weren't normal...
MESSAGE.Translation: But, looking back... there were a lot of things that weren't normal...

MESSAGE.JP: じゃあ…それが…
MESSAGE.EN: In other words...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この世界の…秘密なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that the secret of the world?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that the secret of the world?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな…どうやって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't believe it... How did you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't believe it... How did you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それはわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「暗闇の中…俺は叫んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In the darkness... I shouted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In the darkness... I shouted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは水の波紋のように広がっていった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And it spread out just like a ripple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And it spread out just like a ripple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それに応えるかのように波紋が俺の元まで届いた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As if in answer, other ripples came to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As if in answer, other ripples came to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなは、『そこ』にいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And I found everybody else ❛there.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And I found everybody else ❛there.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それが死の世界なのか、臨死の世界なのか、それはわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I can't tell if it was the world of death or a world of near-death.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I can't tell if it was the world of death or a world of near-death.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ただ、俺たちは『そこ』で意識を共にしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We were simply sharing our consciousnesses ❛there.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We were simply sharing our consciousnesses ❛there.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何も見えなくても、何も聞こえなくても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Even though we couldn't see or hear anything,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Even though we couldn't see or hear anything,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「確かに、俺たちは『そこ』で語り合ったんだ。思いの波紋を広げ合って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝we were able to communicate with one another by spreading ripples of thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝we were able to communicate with one another by spreading ripples of thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そして決めた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And we reached an agreement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And we reached an agreement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふたりのためにひとつの世界を作り上げようと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We all agreed to create a world for you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We all agreed to create a world for you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなとの出会いの日から、『事故が起きる』までの一学期を永遠に繰り返す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A world where we'd endlessly repeat the first semester, from the day we met one another to the day of the accident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A world where we'd endlessly repeat the first semester, from the day we met one another to the day of the accident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな世界を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝When we decided to make such a world,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝When we decided to make such a world,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなの思いが重なり、ひとつの大きな波紋が広がっていった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝our thoughts all mixed together and one huge ripple spread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝our thoughts all mixed together and one huge ripple spread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ここは俺たちの思いによって作り出された世界だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is the world that came out of our thoughts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is the world that came out of our thoughts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなの思いが、世界を作り、現象を起こし、人を動かしてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Our thoughts created the world, caused its events and made its inhabitants move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Our thoughts created the world, caused its events and made its inhabitants move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな世界で、おまえたちが強くなるまで、見守ることにしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And we were watching over you two until you would both grow stronger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And we were watching over you two until you would both grow stronger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いつか、過酷な現実にも負けない強さを得るまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Until you both grew strong enough to overcome the cruel reality.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Until you both grew strong enough to overcome the cruel reality.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つまり…
MESSAGE.EN: In other words...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words...

MESSAGE.JP: ここは…死の世界で…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...this is... a world near death...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...this is... a world near death...

MESSAGE.JP: その淵にいる、僕も鈴も一緒に連れてこられた…。
MESSAGE.EN: We were taken in here, dying...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were taken in here, dying...

MESSAGE.JP: いや…僕らを包み込むように…。
MESSAGE.EN: No... we were cocooned here by them...
MESSAGE.Translation: No... we were cocooned here by them...

MESSAGE.JP: きっと…
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure...

MESSAGE.JP: そこには僕らを思う優しさしかないはずだから…。
MESSAGE.EN: there's nothing in this world but their kindness toward us two...
MESSAGE.Translation: there's nothing in this world but their kindness toward us two...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「けど、俺は失敗した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But I failed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But I failed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やり方が強引すぎた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I tried to force Rin to become strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I tried to force Rin to become strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴の心に深い傷を負わせてしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And she suffered a deep wound in her heart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And she suffered a deep wound in her heart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえが、その心も癒して、ここまで連れてきてくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You cured her and took her here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You cured her and took her here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、おまえはもう十分に強くなった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you are strong enough now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you are strong enough now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴も、昔から考えると、ずっと強くなった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin has also become way stronger than she used to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin has also become way stronger than she used to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、鈴を連れてこの先へ進め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So you must get out of here with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So you must get out of here with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それが最初の一歩だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That'll be your first step.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That'll be your first step.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すべてはそこから始まる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Everything will start from there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everything will start from there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「止まっていた時間が動き出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Time will start flowing again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Time will start flowing again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どんな現実を目の当たりにしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Whatever kind of reality you face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Whatever kind of reality you face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「強く生きろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just stay strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just stay strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Got it, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Got it, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「誓ったんだろう？　強く生きると」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You swore to become stronger, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You swore to become stronger, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…いつ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... When...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... When...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「思い出せずとも、おまえは誓ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Even if you don't remember it, you did swear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Even if you don't remember it, you did swear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今のおまえが忘れてようが、いつかのおまえは強く生きることを誓い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Even if you forgot, you really swore to become stronger...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Even if you forgot, you really swore to become stronger...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そしてここまでやってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And made it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And made it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは誓い通りに、ここまで強さを積み重ねてきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Following your vow, you kept building up your strength little by little until you reached here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Following your vow, you kept building up your strength little by little until you reached here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…どうしてだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah... I don't know why...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah... I don't know why...

MESSAGE.JP: そう誓った日が確かにあった気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I do feel like I made that oath before...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I do feel like I made that oath before...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、ここまで来たんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That is why you could make it here, is it not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That is why you could make it here, is it not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, he's right...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, he's right...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分の意志でここまできたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I got here with my own will...
MESSAGE.Translation: I got here with my own will...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ここで立ち止まるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you going to stop here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you going to stop here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の叱咤が続く。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke keeps pushing me on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke keeps pushing me on.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ずっとここで遊んでるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you going to play here forever?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you going to play here forever?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんな事実を…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's so sudden...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's so sudden...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とつぜん言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Telling me such a truth...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Telling me such a truth...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう…人はいつまでも子供じゃいられない…。
