MESSAGE.EN: Naturally... you can't stay a child forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Naturally... you can't stay a child forever...

MESSAGE.JP: いつまでも遊んでるわけにはいかないんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: There comes a time when you have to stop playing...
MESSAGE.Translation: There comes a time when you have to stop playing...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いかなきゃね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I must go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I must go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのために、ここまでやってきたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That is the reason I came all this way...
MESSAGE.Translation: That is the reason I came all this way...

MESSAGE.JP: わかっていたはずだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should have known...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should have known...

MESSAGE.JP: その先に待つ試練を…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...how hard and tough the road ahead of here would be...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...how hard and tough the road ahead of here would be...

MESSAGE.JP: みんなの思いを無駄にしないためにも…。
MESSAGE.EN: To honor the kindness everyone has shown us...
MESSAGE.Translation: To honor the kindness everyone has shown us...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は…
MESSAGE.EN: I must...
MESSAGE.Translation: I must...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いかなきゃいけないんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I must go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I must go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「強く生きるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Live on with all your strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Live on with all your strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいか、絶対に泣くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And no matter what, do not ever cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And no matter what, do not ever cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ここから先は絶対に泣くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝From here on out, you aren't allowed to cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝From here on out, you aren't allowed to cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな弱さはもう許されないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You are not allowed to show any weakness anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You are not allowed to show any weakness anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I won't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I won't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …もう泣かない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I won't cry ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I won't cry ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな強さを…もう僕は手に入れてるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have already become... strong enough to live without tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have already become... strong enough to live without tears.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が…みんなが…僕にくれたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke... and everyone has given me the strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke... and everyone has given me the strength.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…さあ、鈴、再開だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Now, Rin, let's continue.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Now, Rin, let's continue.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鈴へボールを返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I throw her back the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I throw her back the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…よくわからないがいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I don't get it, but do we keep playing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I don't get it, but do we keep playing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいんだよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Go on, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Go on, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「投げて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーむ…よくわからんが理樹がいうならそうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm... I still don't get it, but if you say so, I'll go on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm... I still don't get it, but if you say so, I'll go on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。僕の言うとおりにすればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, you only need to do as I say.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, you only need to do as I say.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴、連れていくから、僕が。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll take you out there, Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll take you out there, Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 振りかぶって、投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She winds up and pitches.
MESSAGE.Translation: She winds up and pitches.

MESSAGE.JP: カィン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: ぼてぼてのゴロだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hit an easy grounder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hit an easy grounder.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が、それを胸に当て、落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball hits Kengo on the chest and falls onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball hits Kengo on the chest and falls onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 拾おうと前のめりになり、そのまま手を地面について倒れた。
MESSAGE.EN: He leans forward to pick it up, but collapses down on the ground instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: He leans forward to pick it up, but collapses down on the ground instead.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもボールだけは離さなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: He keeps gripping the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: He keeps gripping the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「泣くことは許さないぞ。顔を上げて返してやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You aren't allowed to cry. Chin up and give him back the ball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You aren't allowed to cry. Chin up and give him back the ball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その顔を上げる。今にも泣きそうな顔を。
MESSAGE.EN: He raises his head; his eyes are about to burst into tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: He raises his head; his eyes are about to burst into tears.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は嫌だった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't want this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't want this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が…話を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo... begins to speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo... begins to speak.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やっと、遊べるようになったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I finally got a chance to play with you guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I finally got a chance to play with you guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ずっと、遊んでいたかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I want to keep playing forever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I want to keep playing forever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「失った時間を…取り戻したかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I want to... get back all the time I've lost...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I want to... get back all the time I've lost...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は必死だったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I was so desperate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I was so desperate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「みんなと一緒に居たかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...to be with you guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...to be with you guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「でも…ここでそれも…おしまいだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But... now I can't... anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But... now I can't... anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「鍛えたこの腕も報われず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I trained so hard, but nothing came of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I trained so hard, but nothing came of it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺の人生は…幸せだったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Was my life... happy...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Was my life... happy...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは、誰にもわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No one can answer that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No one can answer that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「謙吾、おまえ自身が決めることだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, that's something you decide yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, that's something you decide yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「謙吾は今、どう思っているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, what do you yourself think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, what do you yourself think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…幸せじゃなかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...That I wasn't happy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...That I wasn't happy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんて、言えるわけないだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How could I say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How could I say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえらみたいな友達に恵まれてっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...when I had great friends like you guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...when I had great friends like you guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「幸せだったさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I was so happy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I was so happy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえたちと出会えていなかった人生なんて考えられない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can't imagine life without having met any of you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can't imagine life without having met any of you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それぐらいだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's how happy I've been!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's how happy I've been!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そいつはよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の元へと近づいてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo walks up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo walks up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿は悠然としている。いつもの謙吾だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He looks as calm and composed as he's always been.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looks as calm and composed as he's always been.

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前で足を止め、ボールを僕に渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He stops in front of me and hands the ball over to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stops in front of me and hands the ball over to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I receive it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I receive it.

MESSAGE.JP: からになった謙吾の手は僕のほうを向いたままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He still holds his hand out toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He still holds his hand out toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「握手を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let's shake hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let's shake hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「友情の証を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝For our friendship.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝For our friendship.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が手を差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I hold out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hold out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 握り合わさる。ごつごつしていて大きな手。
MESSAGE.EN: I seize his hand, so big and rough.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seize his hand, so big and rough.

MESSAGE.JP: でも暖かい。
MESSAGE.EN: But warm.
MESSAGE.Translation: But warm.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「リトルバスターズは不滅だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The Little Busters are forever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The Little Busters are forever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 握るものを失った僕の手は自然と垂れ下がった。
MESSAGE.EN: He vanishes, and my hand falls limply to my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: He vanishes, and my hand falls limply to my side.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 未だ状況を理解していない鈴が不思議がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin still has no idea what's happening.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin still has no idea what's happening.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「馬鹿ふたりはどこいった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Where did those two idiots go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Where did those two idiots go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は黙ったままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't say anything back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't say anything back.

MESSAGE.JP: でもまた、鈴に球を返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I return the ball to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I return the ball to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まだ続けるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are we still gonna play?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are we still gonna play?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は無言のまま頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nod wordlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nod wordlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 震動と共に、地鳴りのような音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The earth suddenly lets out a rumbling along with a tremor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The earth suddenly lets out a rumbling along with a tremor.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Earthquake!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Earthquake!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何かが今まさに失われようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Right now, something is about to disappear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right now, something is about to disappear.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介はこの世界をみんなで作り出したといっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke said that everybody created this world together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke said that everybody created this world together.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が去り、謙吾がいなくなり…
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo are gone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo are gone...

MESSAGE.JP: そして残るは恭介だけ。
MESSAGE.EN: And there's only Kyousuke left.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there's only Kyousuke left.

MESSAGE.JP: 今は…その恭介ひとりでこの世界を支えているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As of now... he's supporting this world all by himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: As of now... he's supporting this world all by himself.

MESSAGE.JP: それが…もうすぐ崩れ去る…そんな音だ。
MESSAGE.EN: And it's about to break down... The heavy sound is telling me that.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it's about to break down... The heavy sound is telling me that.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「急げ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hurry up, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hurry up, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、投げて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, just pitch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, just pitch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝O-okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝O-okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振りかぶる。
MESSAGE.EN: She winds up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She winds up.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後の一球だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The last throw.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last throw.

MESSAGE.JP: しゅっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Shoo*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Shoo*.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶好球。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a good fastball.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a good fastball.

MESSAGE.JP: カン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 芯でミートした。
MESSAGE.EN: I make solid contact with the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I make solid contact with the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り抜いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I swing all the way through.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swing all the way through.

MESSAGE.JP: 大飛球だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a big pop-up.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a big pop-up.

MESSAGE.JP: 見上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I look up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I look up.

MESSAGE.JP: あんなの届くはずもない。
MESSAGE.EN: No one can catch that ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one can catch that ball.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐんぐんと青い空へ向けて伸びていく。
MESSAGE.EN: It keeps soaring up toward the blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: It keeps soaring up toward the blue sky.

MESSAGE.JP: やがて白い点となって消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: And soon turns into a white point and disappears.
MESSAGE.Translation: And soon turns into a white point and disappears.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ったく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Geez.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Geez.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もうおまえたちには敵わねぇな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You two are already beyond me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You two are already beyond me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「サヨナラホームランだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A game-ending home run.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A game-ending home run.❞

MESSAGE.JP: グローブを地面に置くと…
MESSAGE.EN: He puts his glove on the ground...
MESSAGE.Translation: He puts his glove on the ground...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は背中を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and turns around with his back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and turns around with his back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に僕は…すがるように叫んでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I end up shouting his name... beseeching him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I end up shouting his name... beseeching him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはもう、どうしようもないの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there nothing else we can do!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there nothing else we can do!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ…どうしようもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No... it's out of our hands now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No... it's out of our hands now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは誰も悪くない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's nobody's fault...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's nobody's fault...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自分を責めるんじゃないぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't blame yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't blame yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは強くなった、大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're strong enough now, so everything's gonna be all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're strong enough now, so everything's gonna be all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He begins walking off.
MESSAGE.Translation: He begins walking off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待ってよ、話をっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, I want you to talk to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, I want you to talk to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ時間はあるでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We still have time, right!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We still have time, right!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「話をしてよ、恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to talk about something, Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to talk about something, Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっと聞かせてよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me hear your stories!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me hear your stories!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昔みたいにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just the way you always used to!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just the way you always used to!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、これからはおまえがその役なんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you understand that it's going to be your role, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, you understand that it's going to be your role, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなので、鈴をどうする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you're still like this, you can't take care of Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you're still like this, you can't take care of Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、こんなのってないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I can't accept this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I can't accept this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は恭介を追ってここまでずっと生きてきたんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've been following you ever since we met!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've been following you ever since we met!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その恭介がいかないでよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want you to leave me behind!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want you to leave me behind!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隠していた弱さが…涙のように溢れて、こぼれてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The weakness I was hiding... it spills out of me as if it were tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weakness I was hiding... it spills out of me as if it were tears.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ったく困った奴だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Boy, you're such a handful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Boy, you're such a handful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは、いつまで俺を困らせるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝When are you gonna stop making trouble for me...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝When are you gonna stop making trouble for me...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなのいつまでもだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「強くなったとか、世界の秘密とか、そんなことどうだっていいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't give a damn about being strong, or the secrets of the world!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't give a damn about being strong, or the secrets of the world!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は恭介が好きだからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just like you, Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just like you, Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、ずっと一緒にいたいんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I wanna be with you forever!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I wanna be with you forever!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「当然でしょ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that wrong!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that wrong!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あのなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなの、俺のほうが嫌に決まってんだろおぉぉ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I want to stay with you so much more than you do!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I want to stay with you so much more than you do!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんで、おまえらを置いていかなきゃいけないんだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why do I have to leave you two behind!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why do I have to leave you two behind!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺だって、おまえたちと居てぇよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I want to stay with you two as well!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I want to stay with you two as well!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ずっとずっと居たかったんだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I wanted to be with you two forever!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I wanted to be with you two forever!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんで、こんな理不尽なんだよ!!　ちくしょう!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why's the world so cruel!! Goddammit!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why's the world so cruel!! Goddammit!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ずっとずっと、そばにいたかった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I wanted to be with you forever and ever!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I wanted to be with you forever and ever!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺のほうが、ずっとずっとおまえたちのことが好きなんだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I like you guys so much more than you like me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I like you guys so much more than you like me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なのに…おまえたちを置いていくなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But... I have to go without you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But... I have to go without you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなの…ねぇよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I just can't... take it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I just can't... take it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんでだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why the hell...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why the hell...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「わけわかんねぇよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I just don't get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I just don't get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「くそぉ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hell...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hell...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いってくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹…鈴をつれて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki... Go with Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki... Go with Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「校門から、でられる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The school gate is the exit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The school gate is the exit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こ…校門…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-school gate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-school gate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだ…もう振り返るな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's right... Don't look back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's right... Don't look back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「校門を駆け抜けろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just run through the gate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just run through the gate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「時間はもうない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're running out of time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're running out of time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴を巻き添えにしたいのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do you want Rin to get hurt...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do you want Rin to get hurt...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉でようやく、我に返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Those words of his finally reminded me of what it is I have to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those words of his finally reminded me of what it is I have to do.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、鈴を守らないといけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to protect her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to protect her.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「早くいけえぇぇ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝HURRY UP AND GO!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝HURRY UP AND GO!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もう迷うな！　とっとといけぇーーー!!!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝DON'T EVER HESITATE! JUST GO ALREADY!!!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝DON'T EVER HESITATE! JUST GO ALREADY!!!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その怒声が背中を押した。
MESSAGE.EN: His roar pushed me forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: His roar pushed me forward.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鈴を呼んで、その手を掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I call out her name and seize her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I call out her name and seize her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「何が始まる!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's gonna happen!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's gonna happen!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何もかもが。ずっと止まっていた何もかもが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everything is. All the things that were on hold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everything is. All the things that were on hold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは、走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: We took off running.
MESSAGE.Translation: We took off running.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは校門を駆け抜けた。
MESSAGE.EN: And we passed through the gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we passed through the gate.

MESSAGE.JP: もう…声はしない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't hear them... anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't hear them... anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: いったか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Guess they're gone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess they're gone...

MESSAGE.JP: 終わった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's over...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's over...

MESSAGE.JP: …永遠の一学期が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Our eternal first semester is over.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Our eternal first semester is over.

MESSAGE.JP: やり終えたんだよな、俺は…。
MESSAGE.EN: I did everything I had to do, didn't I...?
MESSAGE.Translation: I did everything I had to do, didn't I...?

MESSAGE.JP: 喜んでいいんだよな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can take pride in it, can't I...?
MESSAGE.Translation: I can take pride in it, can't I...?

MESSAGE.JP: よかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: With no regrets...
MESSAGE.Translation: With no regrets...

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stand up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stand up.

MESSAGE.JP: 世界の輪郭はもう朦朧としている。
MESSAGE.EN: The outline of the world is beginning to lose shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: The outline of the world is beginning to lose shape.

MESSAGE.JP: それとも白濁しているのはおれの意識のほうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Or is it my consciousness that's dimming...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or is it my consciousness that's dimming...?

MESSAGE.JP: もう…なんでもいいや…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well... whatever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well... whatever...

MESSAGE.JP: やることはもう何も残っていない…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing left for me to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing left for me to do...

MESSAGE.JP: はは…
MESSAGE.EN: Haha...
MESSAGE.Translation: Haha...

MESSAGE.JP: 手持ちぶさただ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は校舎を見上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I look up at the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I look up at the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に…
MESSAGE.EN: At the very end...
MESSAGE.Translation: At the very end...

MESSAGE.JP: みんなと過ごしたこの場所を見て回るか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'll walk through the place where we all spent our time together...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'll walk through the place where we all spent our time together...
